SA01abhsubhu:5: tathāhyanena kauśalyena dvividho 'nuśaṃso labhyate - manaskārānuśaṃsaṃḥ sāṃkathyaviniścayānuśaṃsaśca /
SA01abhsubhu:7: śamathānukūlyaṃ punareṣu sthāneṣu kṛtakauśalasya niḥsaṃdehatayā yatheṣṭamālaṃbane aikāgrayayogena sukhaṃ cittasamādhānataḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:8: vipaśyanāvṛddhayānu kūlyaṃ bahubhiḥ prakāraiḥ jñeyaparīkṣayā prajñāprakarṣagamanataḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:12: saparigrahadehagrahaṇena bāhyasyādhyātmikasya ca rūpaskandhasya grahaṇaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:15: tathāhi loke prāyeṇa vijñāne ātmagrāhaḥ, śeṣeṣvātmīyagrāha iti //
SA01abhsubhu:17: ṣaḍākāro 'tīto vartamānaścopabhogo vijñānaṣaṭkam, tasya dhāraṇamāśrayālaṃbana bhāvataḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:33: evaṃ caivaṃ ceti varṇasaṃsthānabhedaiḥ citrīkārateti tathāsaṃjñā /
SA01abhsubhu:37: tathāhi śubhānāmaśubhānāṃ vā vipāka ālayavijñānaṃ nityamupekṣayaiva saṃprayuktaṃ bhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:48: yacca tasya cakṣuṣo bījamupacitamālayavijñānaṃ yata āyatyāṃ cakṣunirvartiṣyate,
SA01abhsubhu:50: tadapi dvividhaṃ bījaṃ cakṣurdhāturityucyate, cakṣuṣo hetutvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:53: taddhātuvaddraṣṭavyaṃ tacca yathāyogamiti yena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyati yacca tadbījamityevamādi yojayitavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:64: lakṣaṇataḥ saṃniveśato 'nugrahopaghātataḥ kriyāsaṃniśrayataḥ kriyālakṣaṇataḥ maṇḍanataśca caturṇā daśānāmaṣṭānāmekaikasya ca yathākramam /
SA01abhsubhu:80: tatra sahajo gandhaścandanādonām, sāṃyogiko dhūpayuktyadīnām, pāriṇāmikaḥ pakvaphalādīnāmiti /
SA01abhsubhu:81: spraṣṭavyaikadeśavyavasthānamāmarśanata ātulanataḥ sparśanata āpīḍanataḥ saṃsargato dhātuvaiṣamyasāmyataśca /
SA01abhsubhu:96: saṃkleśataḥ sāmiṣādīnām, vyavadānato nirāmiṣādīnāṃ vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:98: avyavahārakuśalasyāśikṣitabhāṣatayā rūpe saṃjñā bhavati na tu rūpamiti /
SA01abhsubhu:106_0: vedanāsaṃjñāvarjyānāṃ sarveṣāṃ caitasikānāṃ cittaviprayuktānāṃ ca saṃskāraskandhalakṣaṇatve
SA01abhsubhu:110: cetanādīnāṃ caitasikānāṃ lakṣaṇataḥ karmataśca nirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:113: tathāhi [Abhidh-s-bh_5] yathābhisaṃskāraṃ kuśalādiṣu dharmeṣu cittasya pravṛttirbhavatīti /
SA01abhsubhu:114: ālaṃbane cittadhāraṇaṃ tatraiva punaḥ punarāvarjanaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:116: vijñānotpattāvindriyasya sukhādivedanotpattyanukūlo yo vikārastadākāraḥ sparśo veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:119: ata eva tatpradhāno 'nyaiḥ saṃhartu na śakyate saṃstutaṃ vastu pūrvānubhūtaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:126: śakyatve 'bhilāṣākārā, śakyaṃ mayā prāptuṃ niṣpādayituṃ veti /
SA01abhsubhu:128: upapattiprātilambhikaṃ śrutacintāmayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ ca yathākramaṃ vipākāgamādhigamarūpaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:130: sthāmavānvīryavānutsāhī dṛḍhaparākramo 'nikṣiptadhuraḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣvityevamādisūtrapadāni yathākramaṃ saṃnāhādiṣvabhyutsāhavastuṣu yojayitavyāni /
SA01abhsubhu:135: sāsravā dharmā āsravā āsravasthānīyāśca viṣayā iha veditavyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:154: nāsti dattaṃ nāstīṣṭaṃ nāsti kṛtaṃ nāsti sucaritaṃ nāsti duścaritamityayaṃ hetvapavādaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:155: nāsti duścaritasucaritānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipāka iti phalāpavādaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:156: nāstyayaṃ loko nāsti paraloko nāsti mātā nāsti pitā nāsti sattva upapāduka iti kriyāpavādaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:167: rūpādayo nātmā, tadvilakṣaṇatvāt na hi te ātmalakṣaṇā iti /
SA01abhsubhu:172: na hi vinā dehenā tmaparikalpa upalabhyata iti /
SA01abhsubhu:177: rūpāmātmeti samanupaśyati vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānamātmeti samanupaśyatītyetāḥ pañcātmadṛṣṭayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:179: rūpavān yāvadvijñānavāniti saṃbandhenātmīyatā, sā hi tatsaṃvandhāttadvān bhavatīti /
SA01abhsubhu:181: yasya hi yadvaśena vartate dāne viniyoge vā tasya tadātmīyamityucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:185: tadyathā rajjuṃ sarpato gṛhṇāti kaścit sahasā,
SA01abhsubhu:186: na punā rajjuriti nirūpayaṃstāṃ sarpato gṛhṇīyāditi //
SA01abhsubhu:190: dharmataiṣā yadavadyaṃ praticchādayataḥ kaukṛtyam, ataścāsparśavihāra iti /
SA01abhsubhu:202: bahirdhāvikṣepaḥ śrutādikuśale prayuktasya tadālaṃbanādbahiḥ kāmaguṇeṣu cittagamanaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:204: nimittavikṣepaḥ pare māṃ guṇavattayā saṃbhāvayiṣyantītyetannimittametadartha kuśalaprayuktasya śanaiḥ tatparihāṇito veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:205: dauṣṭhulya vikṣepo 'haṃkārādidauṣṭhulyavaśādutpannotpanneṣu sukhādiṣu vediteṣvahaṃ mama asmīti vā karaṇāt kuśalapakṣāpariśuddhito veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:208: nimittīkāraḥ tasyaiva veditasya punaḥ punaścitrīkāro veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:209: manaskāravikṣepaḥ samāpattyantaraṃ vā samāpadyamānasya dhyānāntaraṃ vā saṃśrayataḥ pūrvasmāddhyutthānato veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:218: kuśalā(di)bhāvavacanaṃ na tvavaśyaṃ mohātmaka iti kṛtvā /
SA01abhsubhu:221: yuktaṃ kāle yathānujñam, akāle 'pi glānasya karmaṇyatārtha vā /
SA01abhsubhu:225: anabhipretaṃ karaṇaṃ parairbalādavaṣṭabhya kāryamāṇasya kleśābhibhavādvā yathāyogaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:229: cetanāṃ vā niśritya prajñāṃ vetyanabhyūhābhyūhāvasthāyāṃ yathākramam /
SA01abhsubhu:230: [Abhidh-s-bh_9] paryeṣaṇākārā manaso 'bhijalpanā vitarkaḥ pratyavekṣaṇākārā manaso 'bhijalpanānuvicāra iti //
SA01abhsubhu:233: rāgapratipakṣo vairāgyam, tasya paripanthakaraṇam, tasya tena tadutpattāvantarāyakaraṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:235: cittaviprayuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmadhiṣṭhānataḥ svabhāvataḥ prajñaptitaśca nirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:243: prāptiḥ pratilambhaḥ samāgama iti prajñaptiriti prajñaptinirdeśaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:249: nirodha iti samāpatticittakṛtaḥ kālāntaramasthāvaracittacaittasamudācāranirodho āśrayasyāvasthāviśeṣo nirudhyate 'neneti kṛtvā /
SA01abhsubhu:252: ete ca samāpattī bhūmitaḥ manaskārato 'dhiṣṭhānataḥ svabhāvataḥ prajñaptitaśca nirdeṣṭe āsaṃjñikaṃ manaskāravarjairebhireva /
SA01abhsubhu:255: sthitikālaniyama iyantaṃ kālamanenāsmin nikāyasabhāge 'vasthātavyaṃ varṣaśataṃ varṣasahasraṃ veti karmakṛtaḥ sāmarthyaviśeṣaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:259: bāhyasyāpi rūpasya jātimattve nikāyasabhāgamātragrahaṇaṃ sattvasaṃtāne lakṣaṇaprajñaptijñāpanārtham /
SA01abhsubhu:260: bāhyaṃ hi rūpaṃ saṃvarttavivarttaprabhāvitamā dhyātmikāstu jātijarādiprabhāvitā iti /
SA01abhsubhu:262: ete ca jātyādayo na pratikṣaṇaṃ veditavyāḥ kiṃtarhi prabandhāvasthāsviti /
SA01abhsubhu:263: svabhāvādhivacanaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ devo manuṣya ityevamādi /
SA01abhsubhu:265: tadubhayāśrayeṣvi ti svabhāvaviśeṣādhivacanāśrayeṣvakṣareṣu a i u ityevamādiṣu /
SA01abhsubhu:266: etāvacca sarvaṃ yaduta svabhāvo viśeṣastadubhayavyavahāraśca, tatsarvamebhiranuvyavahriyata iti /
SA01abhsubhu:268: paryāyākṣaraṇatāmupādāyeti yathā cakṣuścakṣurityetasmātparyāyādanyeṣvapi netrākṣinayanalocanādiṣu paryāyāntareṣu kṣarati,
SA01abhsubhu:270: naivaṃ a ityetadakṣaraṃ a ityetaṃ paryāyaṃ mukttvā paryāyāntareṇa śakyate jñāpayitum,
SA01abhsubhu:273: prabandhānupacchede pravṛttivyavasthānamekasmin kṣaṇe vyavacchinne vā tadupacārābhāvāt hetuphalanānātvamiṣṭasya phalasya sucaritamaniṣṭasya duścaritamityevamādi /
SA01abhsubhu:278: hetuphalasya prabandhena pravṛttau satyāṃ yattatra hetuphalamutpannaniruddhaṃ so 'tītaḥ kāla iti prajñapyate,
SA01abhsubhu:284: hetuphalapratyayānāṃ [Abhidh-s-bh_11] samavadhānaṃ tadyathā vijñānākhyasya hi hetuphalasyendriyāparibhedo vipayābhāsagamanaṃ tajjñānaṃ manaskārapratyupasthānaṃ ceti /
SA01abhsubhu:286: ityevamete cittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ dharmāṇāmavasthāsu prajñapanātsarve prajñaptisanto veditavyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:300: ālīyante tasmin dharmā bījataḥ, sattvā vātmagrāheṇetyālayavijñānam /
SA01abhsubhu:305: upāttamādi spaṣṭatvaṃ bījaṃ karma na yujyate /
SA01abhsubhu:318: api ca ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ sā jātirnopalabhyate yāvyākṛtavipākasaṃgṛhītā syāt /
SA01abhsubhu:321: tatra yena yenāśrayeṇa yadvijñānaṃ pravartate tadeva tenopāttaṃ syādavaśiṣṭasyānupāttateti na yujyate,
SA01abhsubhu:324: api ca punaḥ punarāśrayasyopādāna doṣaḥ prasajyate /
SA01abhsubhu:325: tathāhi cakṣurvijñānamekadā pravartate ekadā na pravarttate evamavaśiṣṭāni /
SA01abhsubhu:327: iti pūrvakarmapravarttamānapratyahetuto 'pi kuśalākuśalato 'pi tajjātyanupalaṃbhato 'pi pratiniyatāśrayato 'pi punaḥ punarupādānadoṣato 'pi na yujyate //
SA01abhsubhu:329: sa cetkaścidvadedyadyālaya vijñānamasti tena dvayoḥ vijñānayoḥ yugapatpravṛttirbhaviṣyati /
SA01abhsubhu:330: sa idaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ - adoṣa eva bhavāndoṣasaṃjñī /
SA01abhsubhu:334: tathāhi tatra manaskāro 'pi nirviśiṣṭa indriyamapi viṣayo 'pi //
SA01abhsubhu:335: kena kāraṇenāsatyāṃ yugapadvijñānapravṛttau manovijñānasya cakṣurādivijñānasahānucarasya spaṣṭatvaṃ na saṃbhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:336: tathāhi yasmin samaye 'tītamanubhūtaṃ viṣayaṃ samanusmarati tasmin samaye 'vispaṣṭo manovijñānapracāro bhavati na tu tathā vartamānaviṣayo manaḥpracāro 'vispaṣṭo bhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:338: kena kāraṇena bījatvaṃ na saṃbhavati ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāmanyonyam /
SA01abhsubhu:349: na ca teṣāṃ tathā bījatvaṃ yujyate /
SA01abhsubhu:350: dīrghakālasamucchinnāpi ca saṃtatiścireṇa kālena pravartate, tasmādapi na yujyate //
SA01abhsubhu:351: kena kāraṇenāsatyāṃ yugapadvijñānapravṛttau karma na saṃbhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:353: etā vijñaptayaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe yugapatpravartamānā upalabhyante /
SA01abhsubhu:354: na caikasya vijñānasyaikasmin kṣaṇe idamevaṃrūpaṃ vyatibhinnaṃ karma yujyate //
SA01abhsubhu:356_0: tathāhyekatyasya yoniśo vāyoniśo vā cintayato vānuvitarkayato vā samāhitacetaso vāsamāhitacetaso
SA01abhsubhu:356_1: vā ye kāye kāyānubhavā utpadyante 'nekavidhā bahunānāprakārāste na bhaveyurupalabhyante ca /
SA01abhsubhu:359: tathāhya saṃjñisamāpannasya vā nirodhasamāpannasya vā vijñānameva kāyādapakrāntaṃ syāt /
SA01abhsubhu:363: tathāhi cyavamānasya vijñāna mūrdhvadehaṃ vā śotikurvan vijahāti, adhodehaṃ vā /
SA01abhsubhu:365: ato 'pyālayavijñānasyaiva dehopādāna kasya vigamāddehaśītatā upa[la]bhyate dehāpratisaṃvedanā ca /
SA01abhsubhu:368: mano nirvacanata ālaṃbanataḥ saṃprayogataḥ pravṛttikālataśca nirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:374: dhātvāyatanānāṃ nāsti pṛthaglakṣaṇavyavasthānam, skandhanirdeśa eva cakṣurādīnāmuktalakṣaṇatvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:375: tasmātskandhebhya eva niṣkṛṣya dhātavo vyavasthāpyante, dhātubhya āyatanāni //
SA01abhsubhu:378: ananyathīma vatā sadaiva bhāvanāṃ nirātmatayā draṣṭavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:385: nimittāni rūpaṃ vedanā yāvadbodhiriti prapañcitāni, teṣāṃ tatropaśamādanimittam /
SA01abhsubhu:386: bhūtaṃ yadaviparītam, tasya koṭiḥ paryantaḥ, nairātmyātpareṇa tattvāparyepaṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:387: ākāśaṃ rūpābhāva iti rūpasyava viparyayeṇābhāvalakṣaṇo yo dharmo manovijñānaviṣayastadākāśam /
SA01abhsubhu:392: te 'pi śaśaviṣāṇādayo nāsyaiva vidyamānasya rūpasya viparyayeṇa,
SA01abhsubhu:397: yo nirodho na ca visaṃyoga ityanuśayāsamuddhātāt /
SA01abhsubhu:399: dvayamidaṃ prahātavyam - kleśāśca tadāśrayabhūtaṃ ca vastu veditam /
SA01abhsubhu:400: tatpunarveditaṃ dvividham - vaikārikamavaikārikaṃ ca, sukhaduḥkhamaduḥkhāsukhaṃ ca yathākramam /
SA01abhsubhu:409: mana āyatanena sapta vijñānadhātava ityevaṃ sarvadharmāstrayo bhavanti //
SA01abhsubhu:411: cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇānāṃ pratyekaṃ dvitve sati kathaṃ dhātūnāṃ naikaviṃśatitvam /
SA01abhsubhu:412: yadyapi caiṣāṃ dvitvaṃ na tu dhātvantaratvam,
SA01abhsubhu:420: yathā dvayoścakṣuṣorunmiṣitayoḥ rūpagrahaṇaṃ spaṣṭaṃ bhavati na tathaikasminneveti /
SA01abhsubhu:421: tadyathā ekasminnapavarake dvayoḥ pradīpayorekaṃ prabhāpratānaṃ spaṣṭataraṃ dvau pradīpau niśritya varttate /
SA01abhsubhu:423: ekaikenendriyadvāreṇa vicitraviṣayapratyupasthāne tatprakāreṣu kiṃ krameṇa vijñānānyutpadyante āhosyidyugapadekam /
SA01abhsubhu:428: yathā svaprade śamavaṣṭabhya pradīpapratānavat śabdapratānasyotpādo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:429: yattvāsannatiraskṛtasya śabdasyāspaṣṭaṃ śravaṇaṃ bhavati tacchabdasya pratighātitvādāvaraṇasauṣiryasvalpoktito veditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:430: ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānānāṃ kati vijñānāni savikalpakāni katyavikalpakāni /
SA01abhsubhu:433: tatra svabhāvavikalpaḥ pratyutpanneṣu saṃskāreṣvanubhūyamāneṣu yaḥ svalakṣaṇākāro vikalpaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:436: api khalu sapta vikalpāḥ ālaṃbane svarasavāho vikalpaḥ sanimitto 'nimittaḥ paryeṣakaḥ pratyavekṣakaḥ kliṣṭo 'kliṣṭaśca vikalpaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:440: animitto 'nāgataviṣayo manorathākāro vikalpaḥ śeṣā abhinirūpaṇāvikalpasvabhāvā veditavyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:441: tathāhyekadābhyūhamānaḥ paryeṣate, ekadā pratyavekṣate, ekadā kliṣṭo bhavati, ekadākliṣṭa iti //
SA01abhsubhu:442: yadā rūpādiprativijñaptikaṃ vijñānaṃ tatkena kāraṇena cakṣurādivijñānamityucyate na rūpādibhijñānamiti /
SA01abhsubhu:445: cakṣuṣi vijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānam, āśrayadeśe vijñānotpattitaḥ, sati ca tasmistadbhāvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:446: tathāhi sati cakṣuṣi cakṣurvijñānamavaśyamutpadyate anandhānāmanandhato 'ndhakārasyāpi darśanāt /
SA01abhsubhu:448: cakṣuṣā vijñānaṃ cakṣuvijñānam, tadvaśenāvikṛte 'pi rūpe vijñānasya vikriyāgamanatvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:449: tadyathā kāmalavyādhyupahatena [Abhidh-s-bh_17] cakṣuṣā nīlādirūpeṣvapi pītadarśanameva bhavatīti /
SA01abhsubhu:452: tathāhi vijñānasaṃprayuktenānubhavenendriyasyānugraha upaghāto vā bhavati, na viṣayasyeti /
SA01abhsubhu:453: cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānam, ubhayoḥ sattvasaṃkhyātatvāt na tvavaśyaṃ rūpasyeti //
SA01abhsubhu:454: kiṃ tāvaccakṣū rūpāṇi paśyatīti veditavyamatha vijñānam /
SA01abhsubhu:455: naikaṃ nāparaṃ paśyatīti veditavyam, nirvyāpāratvāt dharmāṇām /
SA01abhsubhu:457: api khalu ṣaḍbhirākāraiḥ cakṣuṣo rūpadarśane prādhānyaṃ veditavyaṃ na vijñānasya /
SA01abhsubhu:465: etacca yathoktaṃ sarva vijñānasya na saṃbhavatīti /
SA01abhsubhu:467: yathā dhātuṣvāyataneṣu cāsaṃskṛtaṃ vyavasthāpitamevaṃ kasmānna skandheṣvapi vyavasthāpitam /
SA01abhsubhu:470: sa ca nityasya na saṃbhavatīti na skandheṣvasaṃskṛtavyavasthānam //
SA01abhsubhu:471: kena kāraṇena ta eva dharmā skandhadhātvāyatanamukhaiḥ pṛthagdeśitāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:473: tathāhi skandhanirdeśe ye rūpavijñāne samāsena nirdiṣṭe te dhātvāyataneṣvekādaśadhā /
SA01abhsubhu:474: saptadhā ca bhittvā vyāsena [Abhidh-s-bh_18] nirdiṣṭe yathāyogam /
SA01abhsubhu:475: ye tu tatra vedanādayo vyastāḥ te dhātvāyataneṣu dharmadhātvāyatanatvena samastā iti /
SA01abhsubhu:478: grahaṇāya dvārabhūtasya grāhyagrāhakamātrasya vyavasthānata āyatananirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:483: ārūpyopapannasya pṛthagjanasya cakṣurheturiti tataḥ pracyutya rūpiṇi dhātāvupapadyamānasya yasmādālayavijñānasaṃniviṣṭāccakṣurbījācca kṣurnirvartiṣyate,
SA01abhsubhu:485: kāyadhāturna kāya ārūpyopapannasya pṛthagjanasya yaḥ kāyadhāturityetadatra vaktavyam,
SA01abhsubhu:488: jāto bhūtaḥ nirvṛtti vṛddhi cādhikṛtya yathākramam //
SA01abhsubhu:493: yathā vedayate tathā saṃjānīta iti yathānubhavaṃ nimittodgrahaṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:494: yathā saṃjānīte tathā cetayati yathāsaṃjñaṃ karmābhisaṃskaraṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:495: yathā cetayate tathā vijñānaṃ tatra tatropagaṃ bhavatīti yathābhisaṃskāraṃ viṣayeṣu gatyantareṣu ca vijñānapariṇāmāt //
SA01abhsubhu:497: yatra saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate ceti sendriye kāye /
SA01abhsubhu:502: sā punaḥ apekṣātṛṣṇā abhinandanātṛṣṇā adhyavasānatṛṣṇā āmatṛṣṇā viṣayatṛṣṇā kāmatṛṣṇā samāpattitṛṣṇā duścaritaduḥkhatṛṣṇā sucaritasukhatṛṣṇā viprakṛṣṭatṛṣṇā sanikṛṣṭatṛṣṇā ca /
SA01abhsubhu:503: asyāḥ tṛṣṇāyā ālaṃbanatvena yathākramamatītādayaḥ prakārā yojitavyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:505: utpannānutpannabhedato grāhakagrāhyabhedato bahirmukhāntarmukhabhedataḥ kliṣṭākliṣṭabhedato viprakṛṣṭasaṃnikṛṣṭabhedataśvātītādīni yathāyogaṃ veditavyāni /
SA01abhsubhu:513: tadyathā loke yena śarīrapradeśena bhāra uhyate tatra skandhopacāro dṛṣṭaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:516: kāryakāraṇabhāvadhāraṇamaṣṭādaśasu dhātuṣu ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānadhātūnāmindriyārthadhātūnāṃ, ca yathākramam /
SA01abhsubhu:517: sarvaprakāradharmasaṃgrahaṇena sūtrāntaranirdiṣṭānāṃ pṛthivīdhātvādīnāmanyeṣāmapi dhātūnāmeṣvevāṣṭādaśasu yathāyogaṃ saṃgrahaṇādveditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:519: rūpādānāṃ phenapiṇḍo pamatvamasato riktataḥ tucchato 'sārataśca [Abhidh-s-bh_20] khyānādveditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:520: eteṣāṃ punaḥ sūtrapadānāmartha ātmaśucisukhanityaviparyāsapratipakṣeṇa yathākramamanātmatāmupādāyetyevamādibhiḥ padarveditavyaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:521: kathaṃ kati kimarthibhiriti praśnatrayavyavasthāpanaṃ lakṣaṇavastusaṃmohayoḥ samāropasya ca prahāṇārtham /
SA01abhsubhu:522: tatra kathaṃ dravyasaditi dravyasato lakṣaṇanirdeśena tatsaṃmohaḥ prahīyate /
SA01abhsubhu:523: sarvāṇi dravyasantītyanena vastusaṃmohaḥ prahīyate ātmadravyābhiniveśatyājanārthamityanena samāropaḥ prahīyate /
SA01abhsubhu:525: abhilāpanirapekṣa indriyagocarastadyathā rūpaṃ vedanetyevamādikaṃ nāmnācitrayitvā yasyārthasya grahaṇaṃ bhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:532: yena saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate ceti rāgādibhiścetasikaiḥ śraddhādibhiśceti veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:533: yā ca tatrāvastheti rūpacittacetasikāvasthāsu prajñaptāścittaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:536: punastrayodaśavidhasya vijñānasya yo viṣayaḥ tajjñeyamanena pradarśitam /
SA01abhsubhu:537_0: tatpunaḥ śrutamayaṃ jñānaṃ cintāmayaṃ jñānaṃ laukikabhāvanāmayaṃ jñānaṃ paramārthajñānaṃ
SA01abhsubhu:537_1: paracittajñānaṃ dharmajñānam anvayajñānaṃ duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ
SA01abhsubhu:542: vidūṣaṇāyāsamutthāpanāyānutpāde jñāne niṣṭhāyāṃ mahārtheṣu jñānaṃ tadvidūṣaṇajñānaṃ yāvanmahārthajñānamiti yojayitavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:552: sarvakālamaparicchinnākāratvāt citrākāravijñaptirekasyāneka ākāro vicitraśceti durvyavasthāpanādasyāḥ sūkṣmatvam /
SA01abhsubhu:553: sahabhāvavijñaptirekakālotpannāti vijñānāni kathaṃ pṛthagyathāsvaṃ viṣayaṃ paricchindantīti durvyavasthāpanātsūkṣmatvam /
SA01abhsubhu:555: vipakṣapratipakṣalaghuparivṛttivijñaptiḥ kathaṃ rāgādisamastabandhanaṃ cittaṃ tanmuhureva sakṛdvītarāgādikaṃ bhavatīti /
SA01abhsubhu:556: vāsanāvijñaptiḥ kathaṃ karmabhiḥ samudācaradbhiḥ cittaṃ vāsyate,
SA01abhsubhu:559: phaladānaṃ ca prati krameṇa vṛttilābha iti /
SA01abhsubhu:561_0: muktavijñaptiḥ kathamarhataścittaṃ paramaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ dharmatāprāptaṃ saṃsārocitasarvaprakārasāśravacaryā
SA01abhsubhu:561_1: samatikrāntamanenākāreṇa vartata iti durvyavasthāpanādasyāḥ sūkṣmatvaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:562: draṣṭādigrahaṇena draṣṭā śrotā ghrātā svādayitā spraṣṭā vijñātā cetyeṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ veditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:570: tatra rūpīti rūpaṃ tasya dharmasyātmasvabhāvastasmādasau rūpī, na tu rūpāntareṇa yuktatvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:575: na tu yathā vedanādīnāṃ pūrvikā ca nāndo samudayaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:579: deśopadeśato 'muṣyāṃ diśīti vyavadeṣṭuṃ śakyatvāt deśagocarataḥ kasmiścitpradeśe sthitasyālaṃbanībhāvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:581: dvayasamagocarataḥ sattvadvayasya samamālaṃ vanībhāvānna tvevamarūpiṇo yathātmānubhavaṃ paraiḥ parigrahītumaśakyatvāditi /
SA01abhsubhu:585: vyābādhanataḥ pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ pāṇyādisaṃsparśaiḥ śokādibhiśca yathāyogaṃ rūpaṇāt bādhanādityarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:589: antarmukhato rūpāvacarasya rūpasya samāpatticittatṛṣṇāsaṃbhūtatvādata evāsya manomayatvaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:599: yathā rūvitadātmato 'pīti vistareṇa rūpītyuktaṃ tathā sanidarśanatadātmato 'pi sanidarśanaṃ vistareṇa yojayitavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:602: āvṛṇotītyetāvati vaktavye āvriyate ceti vacanaṃ prabhādirūpasya sapratighatvavyavasthāpanārtham /
SA01abhsubhu:603: taddhyāvriyata eva nāvṛṇotītyeṣā tasya jātireṣa svabhāva ityarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:605: yanna samādhivaśavarti rūpamiti samādhivaśena vartamānasyāpratighatvāt samacittakadevatāvata /
SA01abhsubhu:606: prakopapadasthānaṃ yatrāśraya ālaṃbane vā dveṣa utpadyate /
SA01abhsubhu:619: trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatanayoḥ pradeśaḥ saparivāramāryamārgamasaṃskṛtaṃ ca hitvā //
SA01abhsubhu:621: yāvanti sāsravāṇi tāvanti saraṇāṇītyevamādi tadānubaṃdhyārthena veditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:625: kāmaguṇādhyavasānahetavo rāgādayo gredhaḥ / kīdṛśena dveṣeṇa tadadhyavasānam / naiṣkramyadveṣeṇa //
SA01abhsubhu:626: kāmakāreṇa saṃmukhībhāvo vimukhībhāvaśca nāsaṃskṛtasya saṃbhavati nityatvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:627: naivasaṃskṛtanāsaṃskṛtasya dvayāvyatirekādyaduktam - dvayamidaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ cāsaṃskṛtaṃ ceti /
SA01abhsubhu:635: taccāsaṃskṛtaṃ ca sthāpayitvā trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ dvayoścāyatanayoḥ pradeśo draṣṭavyaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:649_1: rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ ca devānāṃ pramodabāhulyādbhogeṣu vihāre ca svavaśavarttanādyathāyogam /
SA01abhsubhu:654: pratibimbavibhutvanidarśanotpannaṃ jñeyaṃ vastu sabhāgaṃ vaimokṣikaṃ tāthāgataṃ ca rūpaṃ yathākramam /
SA01abhsubhu:670: svalakṣaṇasya vartamānasya pratyekaṃ pratiniyatasya viṣayasya grāhakaṃ pañcendriyajam /
SA01abhsubhu:671: svasāmānyalakṣaṇasya [Abhidh-s-bh_26] sarvakālasya sarvasya viṣayasya grāhakaṃ ṣaṣṭhendriyajam //
SA01abhsubhu:674: yattāvadgrāhakaṃ grāhyamapi tat cakṣurādīnāmapi manovijñānena grāhyatvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:682: daśānāṃ dhātūnāmiti saptānāṃ vijñānadhātūnāṃ rūpaśabdadharmadhātūnāṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:690: hetau satyanutpannata ityasaṃskṛtādviśeṣaṇārtham, taddhayanutpannamapi sanna hetumaditi /
SA01abhsubhu:698: atītanirdeśādhikāreṇedamapi jñāpyate - kimartha bhagavatātītādīnyeva trīṇi kathāvastūni vyavasthāpitāni na nirvāṇamiti /
SA01abhsubhu:705: ruciḥ saṃtiṣṭhata iti na kevalaṃ rucirevopapattiprātilambhikā kiṃ tarhi saha taiḥ śraddhādibhiriti /
SA01abhsubhu:706: kuśalasya bhāvanā sarve śrutamayādayaḥ kuśalā dharmāveditavyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:710: tadanyaḥ kleśopakleśo duścaritasamutthāpaka iti sa punaryaḥ kāmā[va]caro 'naiḥsargikaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:714: kudṛṣṭipūrvakaṃ yatrānaśanādibhiḥ puṇyārthino varārthinaśca kliśyanta iti /
SA01abhsubhu:716: sugatau tu paripūrakameva, yenātropapanno dāridrayādikaṃ vyasanaṃ pratyanubhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:724: akliṣṭākuśalacetaso yadyasya [Abhidh-s-bh_28] na kliṣṭaṃ nāpi kuśalaṃ ceto bhavati,
SA01abhsubhu:728: adhigamaniṣyandato 'vyākṛtaṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ sahajāmiti yaiścittacaitasikaiḥ vikrīḍanārthaṃ nirmāṇaṃ nirmemīyate /
SA01abhsubhu:735: saha samādhilābhāt prahāṇābhirativipakṣabhūtasya dauṣṭhu[lya]sya prahāṇāt pradeśavairāgyamastīti veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:750: satkāyavairāgyaṃ vā punaradhikṛtya śaikṣasyaikadeśavairāgyamaśaikṣasya sakalavairāgyaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:754: daśavairāgyāṇītyatra prātikūlyārtho vairāgyārtho veditavyo nāvaśyaṃ prahāṇārthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:755: uccataraṃ sthānaṃ prāptavato nihīnesthāne ityuccataraṃ nagaraśraiṣṭhayādisthānaṃ prāptavato grāmamahattarādisthāne nihīne /
SA01abhsubhu:756: bālānāṃ nirvāṇa iti tasya śāntatvājñānāt satkāyābhiṣvaṅgācca /
SA01abhsubhu:757: pratilabdhadarśanamārgasya traidhātuka iti saṃskāraduḥkhatāṃ parijñātavataḥ sarvasāsrava[va]stunirvedāt /
SA01abhsubhu:758: prakṛtyā vairāgyaṃ prakṛtivairāgyaṃ yāvatprahāṇena vairāgyaṃ prahāṇavairāgyamiti padavigrahajātirveditavyā //
SA01abhsubhu:759: mokṣaprayuktasya kuśalaṃ śaikṣamiti saṃbhṛtasaṃbhārāvasthāyāḥ prabhṛtimokṣārtha prayuktasya veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:767: śaikṣasya kliṣṭāvyākṛtamityatra kliṣṭamakuśalaṃ nivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca yathāsaṃbhavam /
SA01abhsubhu:773: dṛṣṭisthānaṃ dṛṣṭisahabhuvo dharmāstadvījaṃ ca tathaiva vicikitsāsthānamapi veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:774: ye ca dṛṣṭau vipratipannāḥ kleśopakleśā iti ye dṛṣṭimukhena pravṛttā tadālaṃbanāśca rāgādayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:776: darśanaprahātavyāviparyayeṇa sāsravā iti parikalpitakliṣṭadṛṣṭayādikādanye sāsravā ityarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:777: atra punaḥ sāsravagrahaṇena nirvedhabhāgīyānāmapi grahaṇaṃ veditavyaṃ dauṣṭhulyānubandhārthena /
SA01abhsubhu:780: daśānāṃ [dhātūnāṃ caturṇā cāyatanānām (ekadeśa) iti] sa cā saṃskṛtaṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:786: sati kevalaṃ pratyaye phalaṃ bhavati, na tu phalotpādanaṃ prati pratyayasya kācidīhetyarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:788: na hyanutpādikāraṇāt kiṃcidutpadyamānaṃ kārya siddhamiti kṛtvā /
SA01abhsubhu:789: avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityevamādi samarthapratyayotpattitāmupādāya nirīhakatvānityatve 'pi sati na yataḥ kutaścit pratyayāt sarvameva phalamutpadyate,
SA01abhsubhu:792: yānyavidyādīni dvādaśāṅgāni vibhaktāni tānyeva punaḥ samasya catvāryaṅgāni bhavantyākṣepā ṅgādīni /
SA01abhsubhu:793: etāvacca pravṛttinirdeśe nirdeṣṭavyam yaduta hetukāle yenākṣipyate yaccākṣipyate phalakāle yenābhinirvartyate yaccābhinirvatyate tadetatsarvamebhiraṅgainirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:796: ākṣiptāṅgaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā ca,
SA01abhsubhu:797: tayā cittavāsanayā nāmarūpādīnā māyatyāṃ pūrvotarasaṃniśrayakrameṇābhinirvṛtaye bījapuṣṭitaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:799_1: sopādāne vijñāne sati maraṇāvasthāyāṃ phaladānaṃ prati chandarāgānurūpyāntarakarmavāsanābhimukhībhāvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:801: tena prakāreṇa karmāntaravāsanābhimukhye satyanyatarasmin gatiyonyādibhedabhinne nikāyasabhāge yathākṣipte nāmarūpādinirvṛtteḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:804: na tvevaṃ jarāyujāyāṃ yonau vinā nāmarūpādibhiḥ ṣaḍāyatanādīnāṃ saṃbhava ityeṣāṃ pṛthagaṅgīkaraṇaṃ veditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:812: avidyā bhave sattvān saṃmohayati, tadāvṛtteḥ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāntānāṃ yathābhūtāparijñānāt /
SA01abhsubhu:815: saṃskārā gatiṣu sattvāna vibhajanti, karmavaśena sattvānāṃ gatyantaragamanavaicitryāt /
SA01abhsubhu:816: pratyayāśca bhavanti vijñānasya vāsanāyāḥ, āyatyā nāmarūpābhinirvṛttaye bījapoṣaṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:818: pratyayaśca bhavati nāmarūpasya, mātuḥ kukṣau vijñānāvakrāntyā nāmarūpavivṛddhigamanāt /
SA01abhsubhu:819: nāmarūpamātmabhāvaṃ sattvān grāhayati tannivṛttyā sattvānāṃ nikāyasabhāgāntarabha janāt /
SA01abhsubhu:824: sparśo viṣayopabhoge sattvān pravartayati, tanmukhena sukhavedanīyāditrividhaviṣayopabhogāt /
SA01abhsubhu:826: vedanā janmopabhoge ca sattvān pravartayati, tadadhiṣṭhāneneṣṭādikarmavipākopabhogāt /
SA01abhsubhu:830: upādānaṃ punarbhavādānāya sopādānaṃ ca sattvānāṃ vijñānaṃ karoti,
SA01abhsubhu:837: pratyayaśca bhavati jarāmaraṇasya, jātau satyāṃ tatprabandhasyānyathātvavināśasaṃbhavāt /
SA01abhsubhu:838: jarāmaraṇaṃ punaḥpunarvayaḥ pariṇāmena jīvitapariṇāmena ca sattvān yojayati,
SA01abhsubhu:858: antareṇa eva kartāraṃ karma kriyā cāsti tatphalopabhogaścetyayamatra karmaphalāvipraṇāśo veditavyaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:870: na svayaṃ na parato dvividhakoṭipratikṣepe 'pi gambhīraḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ syāt prāgeva yatra catasro 'pi koṭayaḥ pratikṣipyante,
SA01abhsubhu:875: bāhyavasyotpattiprabhedato bījaṃ pratītyāṅkuraḥ, aṅkuraṃ pratītya kāṇḍaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:881: parato vā ghoṣaṃ pratītyādhyātmaṃ ca yoniśo manaskāraṃ samyagdṛṣṭistato yāvatsarvāsravakṣaya iti /
SA01abhsubhu:886: jarāmaraṇaṃjarāmara[ṇa]samudayo [jarāmaraṇanirodho] jarāmaraṇanirodhagāminī pratipaditi satyavyavasthānamadhikṛtya pratilomanirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:888: kasminnasati na jarāmaraṇaṃ bhavati kasya nirodhājjarāmaraṇanirodha iti pratilomanirdeśataḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:889: hetupratyaya ālayavijñānaṃ kuśalavāsanā ca sāsravānāsravāṇāṃ ca saṃskārāṇāṃ yathākramam /
SA01abhsubhu:896: api khalu svabhāvato 'pītyevamādinā ṣaḍḍhetavo hetupratyaya iti darśayati /
SA01abhsubhu:923: tadyathā bhūtāni bhautikaṃ ceti yathāsaṃbhavaṃ na tvavaśyaṃ sarvatra saṃghāte catvāri mahābhūtāni bhavanti rūpādikaṃ vā bhautikam /
SA01abhsubhu:924: ityato yadyatrāsti tattena sahotpadyate nānyonyaṃ vineti //
SA01abhsubhu:930: ye dharmāḥ sahabhāvenālaṃbanaṃ pratipadyante nānyatama vaikalyena te saṃpratipattitaḥ saṃprayuktakaheturvyavasthāpyate,
SA01abhsubhu:934: yā aparānte uttarottarā puṣṭataratamā pravṛttiriti taiḥ paripoṣitabījānāṃ tadanvayānāmanāgate kāle viśiṣṭotpattito draṣṭavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:936_0: sarvatragaheturna kevalaṃ sadṛśasyaiva puṣṭaye kiṃ tarhi yasya kasyacidrāgādeḥ kleśasyābhyāsena
SA01abhsubhu:939: nairantaryasamanantarato 'pīti nāvaśyaṃ kṣaṇanairantarya kiṃtarhi cittāntaranairantaryamapyatra nairantarya draṣṭavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:940: itarathā hyacittikasamāpattau vyutthānacittasya samāpatticittaṃ na samanantarapratyayaḥ syāt /
SA01abhsubhu:942: tasmādekasmin saṃtāne paścimasya cittasya pūrvakaṃ cittaṃ cittāntareṇānantaritaṃ [Abhidh-s-bh_38] samanantarapratyayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:944: sabhāgavisabhāgacittacaittotpattisama[na]ntarato 'pīti kuśalāḥ cittacettāḥ kuśalānāṃ sabhāgānāmakuśalāvyākṛtānāṃ ca visabhāgānāmanantarotpannānāṃ samanantarapratyayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:946: tadyathā kāmāvacarā kāmāvacarāṇāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarānāsravāṇāṃ cānantarotpannānāṃ samanantarapratyayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:947: evaṃ rūpāvacarādayo 'pi pṛthagpṛthagrūpāvacarādonāṃ kāmāvacarādīnāṃ cā[na]ntarotpannānāmiti yojayitavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:948: kiṃ khalu sarvasya cintasyānantaraṃ sarva cittamutpadyate, ahosvidasti pratiniyamaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:950: avaitasya cittasyānantaramidaṃ cedaṃ ca cittamutpadyata ityucyamāne bahuvaktavyaṃ jāyate /
SA01abhsubhu:952_0: tadyathā daśabhirbalaiścittasyotpādo veditavyaḥ - paricayabalena chandabalena prayogabalena
SA01abhsubhu:959: adhimātreṇa yatheṣṭaṃ sarvāṇi vā vyutkrāmyānulomaṃ pratilomaṃ ca samāpattirveditavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:960: chandabalena dvitīyadhyānalābhī prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpanno yadyākāṃkṣati dvitīyadhyānabhūmikaṃ vyutthānacittamāmukhīkarotyatha nā kāṃkṣati kāmāvacaraṃ kuśalamanivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ vā /
SA01abhsubhu:962: prayogabalena kāmāvacarasya kuśalasyavānantaraṃ tatprathamato rūpāvacaraṃ cittamutpadyate /
SA01abhsubhu:964: maulasya kuśalasyānantaraṃ dvitīyadhyānasamāpannakamityevamādi vistareṇa yāvadbhavāgrāt veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:967_0: tadvirodhi kleśasaṃprayuktasya punaścittasya hetvādibhiśca turbhirbalaiḥ samudācāro
SA01abhsubhu:968: viṣayabalena yadi rāgādyutpatyanukūlaḥ śubhādinimittaḥ prabhāvotkaṭaviṣaya ābhāsasamāgato bhavati,
SA01abhsubhu:971: pratisaṃdhibalena nava maraṇacittānyātmabhāvatṛṣṇāsaṃprayuktāni triṣu dhātuṣupratyekaṃ kāmarūpārūpyāvacarāṇi /
SA01abhsubhu:972: tatra kāmadhātoścyutvā kāmadhātāveva pratisaṃdhi vadhnataḥ kāmāvacaramātmabhāvatṛṣṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ maraṇacittaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:974: tathā rūpārūpyadhātubhyāṃ cyutvā tatra vānyatra votpadyamānasya ṣaṭcittāni yojayitavyāni /
SA01abhsubhu:978: āryāṇāmapyavītarāgāṇāṃ maraṇakāle yāvadaspaṣṭasaṃjñāvasthāṃ na gacchati tāvadasau tṛṣṇā samudācarati /
SA01abhsubhu:980: vītarāgāṇāṃ tvāryāṇāṃ pratipakṣasya valīyastvānnaivāsau samudācaratyaprahīṇāpi satī /
SA01abhsubhu:987: bodhisattvānāṃ tu praṇidhānabalenopapadyamānānāṃ maraṇacittādikamekāntena sarva kuśalaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:995: savastukaviṣayālaṃbanato dṛṣṭimasmimānaṃ tatsaṃprayuktāṃśca dharmān sthāpayitvā tadanyeṣāmālaṃbanam /
SA01abhsubhu:1003: ālaṃbanapratyaye viniścayaḥ - lakṣaṇato 'pi prabhedato 'pi sthitito 'pi parijñānato 'pi prahāṇato 'pyālavanavyavasthānaṃ veditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:1018: sabhāgamālaṃbanaṃ tadyathā kuśalādīnāṃ kuśalādīni svabhūmikānāṃ ca svabhūmikaṃ sāsravāṇāṃ ca sāsravamanāsravāṇāṃ cānāsravam /
SA01abhsubhu:1032: tattvamālaṃbanaṃ tadyathā tathatā ṣoḍaśānāṃ cākārāṇāṃ satyāni /
SA01abhsubhu:1044: trividhaṃ jñānaṃ vaśitājñānaṃ vipaśyanājñāna nirvikalpajñānaṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:1061: śrāvakayānāśrayaparivṛttyā skandhadhātvāyatanālaṃbanebhyo vimokṣo na tu teṣu vibhutvalābhaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1069: paurāṇaṃ sāsravakarma vipākasyetyevamādi sahabhāvādhipatitaḥ cittaṃ caitasānām,
SA01abhsubhu:1083: vijñānasahitasya vijñānasādṛśyenendriyasya viṣayeṣu prabandhenotpatteḥ vijñānavṛttisādṛśyārthena tadindriyaṃ sabhāgamityucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:1101: duḥkhā vedanā duḥkhātmikā satī svenaiva lakṣaṇena duḥkhaduḥkhatāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1103: sukhāyā vedanāyāstadvedanīyānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ vipariṇāmena daurmanasyotpādāt tadvipariṇatirvipariṇāmaduḥkhatā /
SA01abhsubhu:1104: tatra cānunayena cittasya vipariṇamanaṃ vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā veditavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:1119: ālayavijñānāttadanyattu cakṣurādikaṃ ca sukhaduḥkhādikaṃ ca tadvipākrajamityākhyāṃ labhate tato jātamiti kṛtvā /
SA01abhsubhu:1121: pariṇatitaḥ pāriṇāmikaḥ kavaḍīkāra āhāraḥ, pariṇāmakāle indriyamahābhūtapoṣaṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:1122: viṣayato vaiṣayikaḥ sparśāhāraḥ, iṣṭaviṣayā dhiṣṭhānena sparśenāśrayānugrahaṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:1128: śuddhāśuddhāśrayasthitikaḥ śaikṣāṇāṃ rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ ca pṛthagjanānām, sāvaśeṣavandhanatvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:1134: samāsataḥ prabhedastrividhaḥ, trividhaṃ svabhāvamadhikṛtya pudgalanairātmyanayena veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1135: tatra parikalpitaḥ svabhāvaḥ skandhādīnyadhiṣṭhāyāvidyamāna ātmādisvabhāvo yaḥ parikalpitaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1146: lakṣaṇasaṃgraheṇa rūpaskandho rūpaskandhenaiva saṃgṛhīto vistareṇa yāvaddharmāyatanaṃ dharmāyata[ne]naiva /
SA01abhsubhu:1149: jātisaṃgraheṇa skandhaiḥ rāśyādyarthayuktā rūpādayaḥ sarve saṃgṛhītā vilakṣaṇā apyanyonyaṃ svalakṣaṇenaikajātīyatvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:1151: avasthāsaṃgraheṇa skandhā ekajātīyā api sukhādyavasthāṃ niyamayya sukhāvasthāḥ sukhāvasthaireva saṃgṛhītā na duḥkhādyavasthaiḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1153: yathā skandhā evaṃ dhātava āyatanāni ca /
SA01abhsubhu:1154: sahāyasaṃgraheṇa rūpaskandhaḥ saha tadāśritairvedanādibhiḥ sahāyairgṛhyamāṇaḥ pañcabhiḥ skandhaiḥ saṃgṛhītaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1155: evaṃ vedanādayāpi pratyekaṃ saparivārā gṛhyamāṇāḥ pañcabhiḥ skandhaiḥ saṃgṛhītā bhavanti /
SA01abhsubhu:1156: tathā dhātava āyatanāni ca saparivārāṇi pratyekaṃ sarvardhātubhirāyataneśca saṃgṛhītāni veditavyāni /
SA01abhsubhu:1161: evaṃ kṛtvā yāvanto dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ sūtrāntareṣu teṣāmanyatamasaṃgraha ekadeśasaṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1165: evaṃ kṛtvā yāvanto dharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaṃḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ sūtrāntareṣu teṣāmaśeṣataḥ saṃgrahaḥ sakalasaṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1167: yathāyogamevaṃ dhātavaḥ skandhāyatanarāyatanāni skandhadhātubhiḥ saṃgṛhītāni [iti] vistareṇāvagantavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:1172: araṇyasaṃgṛhītā mṛgā iti loke ucyate tathehāpi cakṣurādibhiḥ cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1173: nibandhasaṃgraho yathā rajjvādinā kāṣṭhabhārādikasya tathā kāyena cakṣurādonāmindriyāṇām /
SA01abhsubhu:1174: tulyārthasaṃgraho yathā samānasarvaprayojanānāṃ visrambhiṇāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ parasparaṃ tarthakālaṃbanapravṛttānāṃ saṃprayuktānāmānyonyam /
SA01abhsubhu:1175: upādānasaṃgraho yathā svāminā ātmīyataḥ parigrahītādīnā dāsādīnāṃ tathālayavijñānenātmabhāvasya /
SA01abhsubhu:1176: avisārasaṃgraho yathā ghaṭenodakasya tathā samādhinā tadanyeṣāṃ cittacaitasikānām /
SA01abhsubhu:1177: abhisaṃkṣepa[saṃ]graho yathā samudreṇa nadīnāṃ tathā rūpaskandhena cakṣurādonāmiti /
SA01abhsubhu:1179: paramāṇudeśe sarveṣāṃ deśināmityekaparamāṇuparyāpannānāṃ rūpādīnāmavinirbhāgaḥ samānadeśatvena veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1180: paramāṇorūrdhva sarveṣāṃ deśināṃ miśrībhāvaḥ tadyathā kaluṣe pānīye appṛthivīparamāṇūnāṃ paramparam /
SA01abhsubhu:1181: deśināmeva samudāyināmanyonyaṃ samavadhānaṃ tadyathā bhittau mṛtpiṇḍena mṛtpiṇḍāntarasya /
SA01abhsubhu:1184: saṃpratipattisaṃprayogaḥ parabhāvena na svabhāvena tadyathā cittaṃ cittāntareṇa na saṃprayujyate,
SA01abhsubhu:1189: sarvatragaḥ saṃpratipattisaṃprayoga vedanādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ sarvāsvavasthāsveṣāṃ vinānyonyamabhāvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:1190: ucitastadekatyānāṃ ca śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāmityekāntalaukikānāṃ kuśalānāmakuśalāvyākṛtānāṃ ca yathāsaṃbhavam /
SA01abhsubhu:1193: samanvāgamo lakṣaṇataḥ pūrvavattadyathā kuśalādīnāṃ dharmāṇāmācayāpacaye prāptiḥ pratilambhaḥ samanvāgama iti prajñaptiḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1194: bījasamanvāgama iti kāmadhātau jātau bhūtastraidhātukaiḥ kleśopakleśaiḥ samanvāgata ityavītarāgaṃ pṛthagjanamadhikṛtyaitadvaiditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:1195: vītarāgastu tatrordhvaṃ vā jāto yato bhūmervītarāgastadbhūmikairasamanvāgataḥ samanvāgataśca,
SA01abhsubhu:1199: yasya yasya prakārasya pratipakṣa utpanna iti bhāvanāprahātavyasyādhimātrādeḥ kleśasya /
SA01abhsubhu:1201: vaśitāsamanvāgamaḥ prāyogikānāṃ kuśalānāmiti śrutamayādīnāṃ satyapi bīje tadabhyāsakṛtāṃ tajjanmikīṃ bījapuṣṭimantareṇa saṃmukhīkartumaśakyatvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:1206: yasyaivaṃ tathatāyāṃ kleśadauṣṭhulyaṃ saṃniviṣṭaṃ bhavati tatsati pratipakṣānukūlapratyayalābhe śakyate samuddhātayitum,
SA01abhsubhu:1214: yaśca sattvaloko yaśca bhājanalokaḥ karmakleśajanitaḥ karmakleśādhipateya ityābhyāṃ tayoḥ sattvabhājanalokayorduḥkhatvakāraṇaṃ jñāpayati //
SA01abhsubhu:1215: api khalu jātirduḥkhamityevamādi pūrvaṃ samasya duḥkhasatyalakṣaṇaṃ vyutpādyādhunā duḥkhasatyamārabhya sūtroktasya nirdeśasyārtha vibhaktumārabhate //
SA01abhsubhu:1216_0: jātirduḥkhaṃ saṃvādaduḥkhatāṃ tadanyadukhasvāśrayatāṃ copādāyeti mātuḥ kukṣāvāmapakvāśayayorantarāle
SA01abhsubhu:1218: ṣaṭ samānānyaṣṭau bhavanti vipariṇatidukhaṃ tridhā kṛtvā //
SA01abhsubhu:1228: tatpuna rasallakṣaṇaṃ yathā nāsti sarvadā duḥkhasatyamā[tmā]tmoyasvabhāvamiti yo 'rthaḥ so 'rtho 'nityaṃ duḥkhasatyamiti /
SA01abhsubhu:1232: viyogalakṣaṇaṃ tadavastheṣveva vastuṣu svabhāvavaśitvabhraṃśaḥ kvacitparaiḥ svīkaraṇamapi veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:1242: prathamadvitīyatṛtīyadhyānasthānāvasāne lokasaṃniveśe saṃvṛtte tadūrdhvaṃ yānyavaśiṣyante dvitīyatṛtīyacaturthadhyānasyānāntarāṇi tāni tāsāṃ śīrṣāṇi veditavyāni /
SA01abhsubhu:1245: taireva tu sarvairjāyamānaiḥ saha tāni vimānāni nirvartante cyavamānaiḥ saha [Abhidh-s-bh_51] tāni nirudhyanta iti /
SA01abhsubhu:1254: tasminnāyatane upapadyāparaparyāyavedanīyakarmaṇa upayuktatvādabhāvādvā tatra bhūyo 'nutpattito veditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:1256: utpādāṃśikī anityatā abhūtvā bhāvaḥ, sa ca duḥkhapakṣyāṇāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ bādhanātmakaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1258: vyayāṃśikī bhūtvābhāvaḥ, sa ca sukhapakṣyāṇāṃ saṃskārāṇāmanabhipretaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1262: saṃskārānityatāṃ saṃskāravipariṇāmatāṃ ca saṃdhāyoktam - mayā yatkiṃcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyetyayamaduḥkhāsukhasya sukhasya ca veditasya duḥkha vacane 'bhisaṃdhirveditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1263: duḥkhasya tu veditasya duḥkhatvena prasiddhatvālloke na tatra punarabhisaṃdhirucyata iti /
SA01abhsubhu:1264: yeṣu cānityeṣu saṃskāreṣu jātyādikaṃ prajñāyate [teṣām] anityatvāt duḥkhamityabhisaṃdhirveditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1267: teṣāṃ ca saṃskārāṇāṃ nityakālaṃ tadrahitaprakṛtikalakṣaṇasya [Abhidh-s-bh_52] nairātmyasya bhāvastadubhayaṃ śūnyatetyucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:1270: tasya yena yena prakāreṇa parikalpyate tena tena prakāreṇābhāvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:1274: kṣaṇikalakṣaṇā tu na prasiddhā sarvasaṃskārāṇāmataḥ sā prasādhayitavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:1275: tatra cittacaitasikānāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ loke prasiddhamataḥ tenāprasiddhaṃ rūpasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ prasādhyate /
SA01abhsubhu:1277: cittopāttatāmupādāya, kṣaṇikena hi cittena kāya upātta /
SA01abhsubhu:1280: tathāhi kāyaḥ savijñānaka eva samudāgacchati vijñānāpakrāntyā ca pūtībhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:1283: cittasya hi [vi]kāreṇa kāyasya vikāro dṛśyate sukhaduḥkharāgadveṣādyavasthāsu /
SA01abhsubhu:1284: ataḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ vikāriṇaścetaso 'nuvidhānāt kāyasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ siddham /
SA01abhsubhu:1286: cittasya hi sendriyaḥ kāya āśrayaḥ prasiddhaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:1287: yasya ca ya utpatyāśrayo nāsau svavināśamantareṇa tasyāśrayībhavandṛṣṭaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1290: cittasyādhipatyasaṃbhūtatāmupādāya, sarvaṃ hyādhyātmikabāhyaṃ rūpaṃ cittasyādhipatyena saṃbhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:1292: ye hetavo ye pratyayāḥ rūpasyātpādāya te 'pyanityāḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:1293: anityān khalu hetupratyayān pratītyotpannaṃ rūpaṃ kuto nityaṃ bhaviṣyatīti sūtrapadānusāreṇa /
SA01abhsubhu:1295: prabhāvaviśiṣṭasya ca cittasya [Abhidh-s-bh_53] rūpaṃ vaśe vartate,
SA01abhsubhu:1299: na hi pratikṣaṇaprakṛtivikāritāmantareṇākasmiko rūpasyānte vikāro yuktaḥ, sa copalabhyate /
SA01abhsubhu:1303: ataḥ pratyayāntaranirapekṣo 'vaśyaṃbhāvī vināśa utpannamātrasyaiva bhāvasya na bhavati paścādbhatīti [na] kiṃcidviśeṣaṇamasti /
SA01abhsubhu:1310: asti sarvabhūtikaḥ sa evārdra uṣṇaśca mṛtpiṇḍo gamanāvasthāyāmiti /
SA01abhsubhu:1317: itya[nya]trāpi yadyatropalabhyate bhūtaṃ bhautikaṃ vā tatra tadastīti veditavyaṃ nānyatra /
SA01abhsubhu:1319: buddhyā paryantabhedatastu paramāṇuvyavasthānaṃ buddhyā yāvānavayapāpakarṣaparyantaḥ śakyate prabhettuṃ tāvatā paramāṇuvyavasthānaṃ kriyate /
SA01abhsubhu:1320: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ yadevaṃ niḥśarīro 'pi paramāṇurvyavasthāpyate /
SA01abhsubhu:1322: avayavaśo hi buddhyā bhidyamāne rūpe sarvametadekaṃ rūpamiti piṇḍasaṃjñā vigacchati,
SA01abhsubhu:1325: evaṃ hi buddhyā bhidyamānaṃ rūpaṃ na kiṃcidbhavatīti matvā rūpadravyasyāpariniṣpattiṃ praviśati,
SA01abhsubhu:1328_1: yathākramaṃ tadvipulamasaṃlikhitaṃ ca veditavyam saṃlikhitaṃ tadevotpannamokṣabhāgīyānām,
SA01abhsubhu:1337: paraṃ saptāhaṃ tiṣṭhatyantareṇa ca cyavate yadyupapattipratyayān labhate /
SA01abhsubhu:1338: atha na labhate saptāhātpareṇa cyutvā punarantarābhava eva nivartate /
SA01abhsubhu:1339: evaṃ yāva[t] saptakṛtvaḥ tataḥ pareṇa ekadā ca vyāvartate yadi tadavasthā syādyatropapattipratya[ya] /
SA01abhsubhu:1340: balavanta āmukhībhūtā bhavanti caturthadhyānalābhino 'rhattvābhimānino bhikṣostadbhūmikāntarābhavābhinirvṛttau mokṣāpavādi kamithyādṛṣṭipratilambhānnārakāntarābhavābhinirvṛttivat /
SA01abhsubhu:1342: sabhāgāṃśca sattvānpaśyati yaiḥ saha pūrva tatkuśalamakuśalaṃ vā caritaṃ bhavati taiḥ saha vartamānamātmānaṃ svapna iva saṃjānīte /
SA01abhsubhu:1344: tata ūrdhvamindriyābhinirvṛttiryathā pratītyasamutpāda iti nāmarūpādyānupūrvyā / yathoktam -
SA01abhsubhu:1352: kleśāḥ kleśādhipateyaṃ ca karma iti sāsravamityarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:1353: yadyevaṃ kimartha bhagavatā tṛṣṇaiva samudayanirdeśe nirdiṣṭā /
SA01abhsubhu:1364: ālayavijñānaṃ viśeṣeṇa saṃskāraduḥkhatāvasthaṃ tatra cātmasaṃmohasukhena tṛṣṇā pravṛttā veditavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:1366: atīte tāvadadhvanyapekṣākāreṇānugatā, anāgate abhinandanākāreṇa, pratyutpanne adhyavasānākāreṇa /
SA01abhsubhu:1373: dṛṣṭeḥ prañcākāro bhedaḥ - satkāyadṛṣṭirantagrāhadṛṣṭimithyādṛṣṭiḥ dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśa iti //

SA01abhsubhu:2162: yadā tulayopakleśe utpanne tadapakarṣaṇārtha prasadanīyādimanaskāraiḥ cittamunnāmayati,
SA01abhsubhu:2163: [Abhidh-s-bh_87] auddhatyopakleśe cotpanne pratyāsaṃkṣepamukhena cittaṃ dhārayati tadā vīryamārabhata ityucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2170: chandasamādhiryat satkṛtyaprayogamāgamya spṛśati cittasyaikāgratāṃ tīvreṇa chandena tīvreṇādareṇa prayogaḥ satkṛtyaprayoga iti kṛtvā /
SA01abhsubhu:2172: tadvīryamityucyate yannityaṃ prayujyata eva na kadācinna prayujyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2173: cittasamādhiryatpūrvajanmāntare samādhibhāvanāmāgamyatatparipuṣṭabījatvāccittasya svarasena samādhyanukūlapariṇāme sati spṛśati cittasyaikāgratām /
SA01abhsubhu:2174: api khalu ṛddhipādābhinirhārayornidarśanārthameva samyakprahāṇabhāvanāyāṃ chandaṃ janayatītyevamādinirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2175: cittaṃ pradadhāti pragṛhṇātītyeṣā cātra pāṭhānupūrvī veditavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:2176: tatra cittasamādhiryaccitaṃ pradadhat spṛśatīti pratyātmaṃ cittameva cittaṃ dhārayan śamayannabhisaṃkṣipannadhigacchatītyarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2183: tathāhi yo yenārthī bhavati tatprāptyartha vyāyacchate /
SA01abhsubhu:2198: etacca yathā kramamadhikṛtyoktaṃ bhagavatā - naca me chando 'tilīno bhaviṣyati,
SA01abhsubhu:2202: vivṛtena cetasāparyavanaddhena saprabhāsasahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayiṣyāmi na ca me 'ndhakārāyattatvaṃ bhaviṣyati cetasa iti /
SA01abhsubhu:2205: phalaṃ tadādhipatyādacireṇa kālena darśanamārgasyotpādaḥ tasminneva ca kāle nirvedhabhāgīyabhajanaṃ ca saṃtānasya //
SA01abhsubhu:2208: tathāhyeṣāṃ tacca yathoktam - āśradvyādivipakṣanirlekhaścādhika ityata evaiṣāṃ tulyānāmālaṃbanasvabhāvādikānāmapyanavamṛdyatārthaviśeṣeṇa bodhipakṣāntaratvam //
SA01abhsubhu:2216: tatra prasrabdhyā na saṃkliśyate, tayā dauṣṭhulyasrāvaṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2219: bhāvanā smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritamityevamādirebhiḥ caturbhiḥ padairyathākramaṃ catuḥsatyālaṃbanā bodhyaṅgabhāvanā paridīpitā /
SA01abhsubhu:2220: tathāhi duḥkhaṃ duḥkhata ālaṃbamānasya tadvivekānveṣaṇādduḥkhālaṃbanaṃ vivekaniśritamityucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2221: tṛṣṇālakṣaṇaṃ duḥkhasamudayaṃ duḥkhasamudayata ālaṃbamānasya tadvirāgānveṣaṇāttadālaṃbanaṃ virāganiśritam /
SA01abhsubhu:2223: duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad vyavasarga ityucyate, tayā duḥkhavisarjanāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2225: phalaṃ darśanaheyānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇam, bodhyaṅgānāṃ darśanamārgasvabhāvatvāt //
SA01abhsubhu:2226: mārgāṅgānāmālaṃbanaṃ darśanamārgāduttarakālaṃ saiva yathādṛṣṭānāṃ satyānāṃ yathābhūtatā /
SA01abhsubhu:2228: tatra samyagdṛṣṭiḥ paricchedāṅgam, tayā yathānubhavaṃ tattvāvadhāraṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2229: samyaksaṃkalpaḥ parasaṃprāpaṇāṅgam, tena yathādhigamaṃ vyavasthāpya vāksamutthāpanāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2233: samyakkarmāntenābhikramapratikramādiṣu saṃpannacāritratayā śīlaviśuddhiḥ samyagājīvena yathānujñaṃ dharmeṇa cīvarādiparyeṣaṇādājīvaviśuddhiriti /
SA01abhsubhu:2238: bhāvanā bodhyaṅgavat, tadyathā samyagdṛṣṭiṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritāmiti vistaraḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2240: pratipadāṃ dharmapadānāṃ ca pūrvavadarthanirdeśo veditavyaḥ dukhā pratipadanāgamyārūpyaniśritā yathākramaṃ śamathavipaśyanāmāndhāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2245: tasya cittasyaivamādita upanibaddhasya calasyaudārikasya tasminnevālaṃbane saṃtatiyogena sūkṣmīkaraṇena cābhisaṃkṣepaḥ saṃsthāpanā /
SA01abhsubhu:2248: pūrvameva vikṣepanimitteṣu rūpādiṣvādīnavasaṃjñāmadhipati kṛtvā cittasya prasarādānaṃ damanam /
SA01abhsubhu:2254: tatra caritaviśodhanamālaṃbanaṃ kauśalyālaṃbanaṃ vā kleśaviśodhanaṃ vā yāvadbhāvikatayā [Abhidh-s-bh_91] vicinoti,
SA01abhsubhu:2258: api khalu [śamatha]vipaśyanāmāgamya catvāro mārgā iti catvāro mārgopadeśanāmadhikṛtya /
SA01abhsubhu:2259: tatra prathamaḥ śamathasya lābhitvādabhiniṣīdanneva cittaṃ sthāpayati yāvatsamādhatte,
SA01abhsubhu:2260: vipaśyānāyā alābhitvāttu samādhiṃ niśritya paścāttathāniṣaṇṇastān dharmānvicinoti yāvatparimīmāṃsāmāpadyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2263: kathaṃ kṛtvā, śrutodgrahaṇamukhena vivaśyanāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti tatpūrvakaṃ ca śamathe /
SA01abhsubhu:2265: ajñātamājñāsyāmīndriyaṃ prayogamārge nirvedhabhāgīyasaṃgṛhīte pañcadaśasu ca darśanamārgacittakṣaṇeṣu yadindriyam,
SA01abhsubhu:2276: ūrdhvabhūmike mārge saṃmukhībhāvena bhāvyamāne 'saṃmukhībhūtānyapyadhobhūmikāni kuśalamūlakāni [Abhidh-s-bh_92] bhāvanāṃ gacchanti,
SA01abhsubhu:2283: yataścakṣurādayo dharmāḥ sanāmābhiniveśāḥ punaḥ punaḥ pravartanta iti /
SA01abhsubhu:2306: yathoktaṃ - "tasya cetovimukteḥ pāripūryā prajñāvimukteḥ pāripūryā kāyadauṣṭhulyānāṃ pratiprasrabdheḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2307: smṛtyā samanvāgamahetorevamasya prathamaṃ dvāraṃ sudāntaṃ bhavati suguptaṃ surakṣitaṃ susaṃvṛtaṃ subhāṣitam,
SA01abhsubhu:2308: yaduta cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣvevaṃ yāvanmano vijñeyeṣu dharmeṣvi"ti //
SA01abhsubhu:2310: sa ca samādhirnirantarastatpravāharaya laukikena mārge ṇāntarākhaṇḍanāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2314: etadarthapratibimbanārtha bhagavatoktam - tadyathā mahāśailaḥ parvato 'khaṇḍo 'cchidro 'śuṣira ekadhanaḥ susaṃvṛta iti //
SA01abhsubhu:2319: mārgāśrayaparivṛtiḥ pūrvaṃ laukiko mārgo 'bhisamayakāle lokottaratvena parivṛtaḥ śaikṣaścocyate sāvaśeṣakaraṇīyatvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2320: yadā tu nirhatāśeṣavipakṣo bhavati traidhātukavairāgyāttadāsya mārgasvabhāvasyāśrayasya paripūrṇā parivṛttirvyavasthāpyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2322: kṣaye sati, viṣaye vā tasmin yajjñānaṃ kṣayajñānametaduktaṃ bhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:2323: niravaśeṣaṃ prakṣīṇe samudaye yajjñānaṃ tadavasthasya hetunirodhālaṃbanaṃ vā kṣayajñānamiti //
SA01abhsubhu:2324: tathānutpāde sati viṣaye vā tasmin yajjñānamanutpādajñānam āyatyāṃ sarvasya duḥkhasyātyantamanutpattidharmatāyāṃ satyāṃ yajjñānamanyasatyālaṃbanamiti /
SA01abhsubhu:2340: viparyayeṇa lokottarāḥ supraviṣṭā nirāvaraṇāśca santo nirvikalpatayā laukikebhyo viśiṣyante /
SA01abhsubhu:2349: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ tathāgatastamabhipretamartha vivṛtyaiva na deśayatītyāha daśānuśaṃsān saṃpaśyaṃstathāgataḥ sūcanākāreṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /
SA01abhsubhu:2359: bhāvagamyo 'yaṃ dharma ityavagamya jātāsthasya tasmin dharme ādaramukhena śraddhādisaṃbhāraparipūraṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2360: āśu dharmatāṃ pratividhyati, tathādaraprayogiṇaḥ prajñāyāḥ taikṣṇībhāvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2364: abhiprāyārtha tīvreṇa yogena cintayitvā labdhavataḥ prāmodyaviśeṣādhigamāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2367: ata eva paṇḍitaḥ paṇḍita iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati,
SA01abhsubhu:2371: udānaṃ yadāttamanaskenodāhṛtam tadyathā yadā ime prādurbhavanti dharmā ityevamādi //
SA01abhsubhu:2372: nidānaṃ yatkiṃcideva pudgalamuddiśya bhāṣitaṃ sotpattikaśikṣā prajñaptikabhāṣitaṃ vā,
SA01abhsubhu:2397: punaḥ sūtrapiṭakaṃ niśritya vineyāḥ śikṣātraye vyutpadyante, tatra tasya vistareṇodbhāvitatvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2405: abhidharmaṃ niśritya parasparaṃ sāṃkathyaviniścayakṛtena dharmasaṃbhogena sparśavihāro bhavati,
SA01abhsubhu:2417: śataṃ śatasahasrāṇāṃ koṭirityevaṃ sarvāsūttarāsu saṃkhyāsvavaśyamanayoḥ daśaśatasaṃkhyayoranyataropaniṣadbhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:2418: ata ete eva samasya daśaśatānyeko dharmaskandho vyavasthāpyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2419: anayā ca gaṇanayā caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇyaṣṭau koṭyaḥ catvāriśacca lakṣā bhavanti //
SA01abhsubhu:2420: sa eṣa piṭakatrayasaṃgṛhīto dharmaḥ kasya gocaraḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2425: ākāraḥ, yān skandhādīnartha prakārānārabhya sā deśanā, tadākārāste cittacaitasikā veditavyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2427: tatra deśanākāle paravijñaptirāśrayo yo 'sāvucyate parato ghoṣata iti tata uttarakālaṃ smṛtirāśrayo yathāśrutamanusmṛtyābhyasanāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2434: yāvadbhāvikatayā dharmāṇāmetāvanti sarvadharmavastuni yajjñeyavyavasthānam tadyathā skandhadhātvāyatanāni /
SA01abhsubhu:2436: tadyathā satyamukhena tānyeva skandhadhātvāyatanāni yathāsaṃbhavaṃ duḥkhatojñeyāni yāvanmārgataḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2437: ākāramukhenaikaikaṃ satyaṃ caturbhirākārairjñeyam, aviśeṣataśca sarvāṇi tathatākāreṇa /
SA01abhsubhu:2438: dharmoddānādhikāreṇa vānityataḥ sarvasaṃskārā jñeyā yāvacchāntato nirvāṇam /
SA01abhsubhu:2441: yathāvadbhāvikatāyā nirdaśe ṣoḍaśaprakārā uktāstrayaśca vimokṣākārāḥ teṣāṃ cānyonyasaṃgrahaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2449: na hyeṣāṃ nirhetuka utpādo nāpīśvarādiviṣamahetuka iti yajjñānamidaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalyam /
SA01abhsubhu:2451: tadyathā sucaritasyeṣṭo vipāko duścaritasyāniṣṭa ityevamādi yajjñānamidaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalyaṃ veditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:2455: sūtrādidharmavicārāṇāṃ saṃbnadhena catasro yuktayo varṇyante, tābhistadvicāraṇāt //
SA01abhsubhu:2463: dharmatāyuktistadyathāgninā dāhaḥ, udakena kleda ityevamādikā prasiddhā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā /
SA01abhsubhu:2464: yathoktaṃ cakṣuḥ samṛddhaṃ śūnyaṃ nityena yāvadātmīyena /
SA01abhsubhu:2467: nāmaparyeṣaṇā nāmakāyādīnāṃ prajñaptisattvādapariniṣpannameṣāṃ svalakṣaṇamiti yā vicāraṇā /
SA01abhsubhu:2468: vastuparyeṣaṇā skandhādīnāṃ tathāpariniṣpattiryathā nāmakāyādibhirabhilapyanta iti yā saṃtīraṇā parīkṣaṇetyarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2472: tathāhi vyutpannavyavahārasyābhidhānamātraṃ śrutvā tadabhidheye saṃpratyaya utpadyate smṛtimukhena,
SA01abhsubhu:2474: ityevaṃvidhe saṃbandhe prasiddhe cakṣurityevamādisvalakṣaṇaprajñaptimātraṃ tadākhyāmāsapiṇḍādivyavahārasya nimittaṃ bhavatīti yā parīkṣeyamucyate svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā /
SA01abhsubhu:2478: tatra ādhāro yādṛśaṃ bāhuśrutyaṃ śamathavipaśyanayoḥ pratiṣṭhā bhavatyālaṃbanayogena tadādhāra ityucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2480: ādhānaṃ tadālaṃbano yoniśomanaskāraḥ, tena tasmin bāhuśrutye 'viparītārthacittākāreṇa cittākaraṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2484_0: kathaṃ ca punaḥ bodhisattva ekasyāṃ yaugabhūmau prayukto nopalambhaṃ spṛśati saṃbhṛtapuṇyajñāna
SA01abhsubhu:2486: niśritya dhyāyati tattasmātsamāhitāccittādananyaditi saṃpaśyaṃstasmin pratibimbe viṣayasaṃjñāṃ vyāvartya tadākāraṃ svasaṃjñāmātramavadhārayati /
SA01abhsubhu:2487: tadā cāsau svacittamātrāvasthānādadhyātma sthitacitto bhavan sarvathā grāhyabhāvaṃ prativedayate /
SA01abhsubhu:2488: tataśca grāhyābhāvādgrāhakamapi na pariniṣpannamiti tasyāpyabhāvaṃ parivedayate /
SA01abhsubhu:2490: etadeva cādhikṛtyoktaṃ bhagavatā pratibimbaṃ manaḥ paśyanniti vistaraḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2492: sā ceyaṃ yogabhūmirhetutaḥ phalataśca nirdiṣṭā veditavyā /
SA01abhsubhu:2495_1: ca gṛhṇātītyatra sūtre taireva pañcabhirdharmairlaghugrahaṇādīni catvāri yathāyogaṃ veditavyāni /
SA01abhsubhu:2505: dharmavihārī bhikṣurdharmavihāri bhikṣuriti bhadantocyata ityatra sūtre bhagavatā samastena śrutacintābhāvanāvihāreṇa dharmavihāro bhavati,
SA01abhsubhu:2507: tatra paryāptisvādhyāyadeśanābahulā vitarkaṇā bahulāścetyanena kevalaṃ śrutacintāprayuktā na bhāvanāprayuktā yogādiriñcanādato [na] dharmavihāriṇo vyavasthāpyante /
SA01abhsubhu:2508: yo 'pi kaścicchrutacintāmanāgamya kevalaṃ bhāvanāprayuktaḥ syātso 'pi na dharmavihārī vyavasthāpyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2509: tata eva tāvaddharmavihāriṇaṃ bhikṣumārabhya iha tu bhikṣurddharmaṃ paryāpnoti sūtraṃ geyamiti vistareṇoktvā paścādāha na riñcati yogamityevamādi,
SA01abhsubhu:2510: yathā vijñāyeta śrutaṃ cintāṃ bhāvanāṃ cāgamya tadubhayavihāreṇa dharmavihārīti /
SA01abhsubhu:2511: na riñcati yogamityevamādinā samādhiprayogāsaṃtuṣṭibhyāṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ saṃdarśitam /
SA01abhsubhu:2512: samādhiprayogaḥ [Abhidh-s-bh_102] punardvividhaḥ saṃdarśitaḥ sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogasaṃgṛhītaśca na riñcati yogamityanena,
SA01abhsubhu:2518: tatra saṃkhyā dvividhā, gaṇanāsaṃkhyā tanmātrasaṃkhyā ca /
SA01abhsubhu:2520: sarvākārayorvodhisattvābhyudayaniḥśreyasamārgayostisṛbhistisṛbhiśca saṃgrahāt ṣaḍevapāramitā na bhūyasyo nālpoyasya itīyaṃ tanmātrasaṃkhyā //
SA01abhsubhu:2548: yadbodhisattvasya bodhisattvadharmatāyāṃ vyavasthitasya bodhicittaṃ niśritya karuṇāpuraḥsareṇa cetasā sarvāstiparityāge kāyavāṅmanaskarma /
SA01abhsubhu:2549: evaṃ ca kṛtvā dānapāramitāyāḥ lakṣaṇaṃ gotrataḥ praṇidhānata āśayato vastutaḥ svabhāvataśca nirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:2554: kāyavāṅmanaskarmasvabhāva ityevaṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitā vistareṇa veditavyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2556: śīlakṣāntivīryapāramitāsu yathākramaṃ sarvasaṃvarasamādānānurakṣāyāṃ sarvāpakāraduḥkhamarṣaṇādhivāsanāyāṃ sarvakuśaladharmasamudānayanatāyāṃ yatkāyavāṅmanaskarmeti veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:2558: prajñāpāramitā[yāṃ] sarvākārakāyavāṅmanaskarmavibhutve yaḥ sarvākāro dharmapravicaya iti vaktavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:2560: punaryaddānaṃ sarvajñatāmārabhya sarvajñatāyai saṃvartate sarvajñatāṃ parigṛhṇāti sarvajñatākṛtyaṃ ca karoti taddānapārimitetyucyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2561: etāni punaścatvāri padāni yathākramamārambhato vāsanātaḥ kāyato nisyandataśca veditavyāni /
SA01abhsubhu:2563: tadeva punardānaṃ saṃtati vāsayate, yata āyatyāṃ sarvajñatāyai saṃvartate /
SA01abhsubhu:2564: tadeva yadā paripūrṇaṃ bhavati tadā dharmakāyapariniṣpādanayogena sarvajñatāṃ parigṛhṇāti /
SA01abhsubhu:2568: uttarottarasaṃniśrayatāmupādāya dānapāramitayādhyātmikabāhyasarvavastuparityāgābhyāsātkāyajīvitanirapekṣo bodhisattvo mahāntamapi bhogaskandhaṃ prahāya śīlasamādānaṃ karoti /
SA01abhsubhu:2569: śīlānurakṣī - ākruṣṭena mayā na pratyākroṣṭavyam - ityevamādibhiḥ prakāraiḥ kṣamo bhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:2572: saṃpannadhyānaśca samāhitacitto yathābhūtajñānāllokottarāṃ prajñāṃ pratilabhata iti //
SA01abhsubhu:2573: punaruttarottarādhārataḥ, śīlaṃ dānasyādhāra evaṃ yāvatprajñā dhyānasya /
SA01abhsubhu:2574: tathāhi śīlavato dānaṃ viśuddhaṃ bhavati, dānenānugṛhītasya śīlena paghātākaraṇataḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2579: dhyāyinī vīryaviśuddhiḥ, saha sukhena saumanasyena sarvakuśaladharmaprayogāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2586: sarvasūkṣmā tu prajñā, ataḥ sarvapaścādvyavasthāpyata iti //
SA01abhsubhu:2594: trividhā paramatā - svabhāvaparamatā sahaparicayena, upāyaparamatā, phalaparamatā ca /
SA01abhsubhu:2611: niṣpattiparamatvaṃ daśamyāṃ bhūmau tāthāgatyāṃ ca bodhisattvapariniṣpattyā buddhapariniṣpattyā ceti //
SA01abhsubhu:2612: punaḥ paramairīhitā itāśceti pāramitāḥ, buddhabodhisattvaiśceṣṭitā gatāścetyarthaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:2614: punaḥ parānātmānaṃ ca paramāmīti tārayantoti pāramitāḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:2620: kṣaticittaṃ punaryenāpa kāriṇāṃ pratyapakāraḥ kriyate tasyāgatasyānayā vilopanaṃ tiraskaraṇaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:2621: kṣatameṣāṃ vairaṃ vidyata iti kṣatinasteṣāmabhayaprakāśanaṃ kṣemasyāviṣkaraṇaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:2624: vṛddhaye īhā kuśaladharmasamudāgamāya dvābhyāṃ samyakprahāṇābhyāṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:2632: tatra parapraṇītajñānaṃ parato ghoṣānvayā yoniśomanaskārasaṃprayuktā prajñā,
SA01abhsubhu:2639: hetusaṃniśritā yo gotrabalena pāramitāsu pratipattyabhyāsaḥ vipākasaṃniśritā ya ātmabhāvasaṃpattibalena /
SA01abhsubhu:2647: āśayasaṃniśritā pāramitābhāvanā ṣaḍākārā - atṛptāśayena vaipulyāśayena muditāśayenopakarāśayena nirlepāśayena kalyāṇāśayena ca /
SA01abhsubhu:2649: yathā caikasattvasyaivaṃ yāvān sattvadhāturanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2650: tamanena paryāyeṇa pratipādayedatṛpta eva bodhisattvasya dānāśaya iti /
SA01abhsubhu:2652: na ca bodhisattva evaṃrūpāṃ dānaparaṃparāṃ kṣaṇamātramapi hāpayati vicchinattyābodhimaṇḍaniṣadanāditi /
SA01abhsubhu:2653: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne vipulāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2655: na ca te sattvāstena dānenānugṛhyamāṇā iti /
SA01abhsubhu:2656: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne muditāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2657: upakaratarāṃśca bodhisattvastān sattvānātmanaḥ samanupaśyati yeṣāṃ tathā dānenopakaroti nātmānam,
SA01abhsubhu:2659: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne upakarāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2660: na ca bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu tathā vipulamapi dānamayaṃ puṇyamabhisaṃskṛtya pratikāreṇa vārthī bhavati vipākena veti /
SA01abhsubhu:2661: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dānapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ nirlepāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2662: yadbodhisattvastathā vipulasyāpi dānaskandhasya vipākaṃ sattveṣvevābhinandati nātmanaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:2664: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dānapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ kalyāṇāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2667: etena paryāyeṇa yāvacchīlaskandho yāvatprajñāskandho yenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
SA01abhsubhu:2669: atṛpta evaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāmāśayo yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanā[yā]māśaya iti /
SA01abhsubhu:2670: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattva[sya] śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāmatṛptāśayo yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāvanāyām /
SA01abhsubhu:2671: yadbodhisattvastāṃ śīlapāramitābhāvanāparaṃparāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāparaṃparamā bodhimaṇḍaniṣadanānna bhraṃśayati na vicchinattīti /
SA01abhsubhu:2672: ya evaṃrūpa āśāyo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ vipulāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2673: muditataraśca bodhisattvo bhavati tayā śīlapāramitābhāvanayā yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanayā sattvānanugṛhṇan,
SA01abhsubhu:2674: na tveva te sattvā anugṛhyamāṇā iti /
SA01abhsubhu:2675: ya evaṃrūpaāśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ muditāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2676: upakaratarāṃśca sa bodhisattvastān sattvānātmanaḥ samanupaśyati yeṣāṃ tathā śīlapāramitābhāvanayā yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanayā upakarāti nātmānam,
SA01abhsubhu:2678: ya evarūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāmupakarāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2679: na ca bodhisattvastathā vipulamapi śīlapāramitāmayaṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāmayaṃ puṇyamabhisaṃskṛtya tasya pratikāreṇa [Abhidh-s-bh_108] vārthī bhavati vipākena veti /
SA01abhsubhu:2680: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ nirlepāśayaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2681: tatra yadbodhisattva evaṃ śīlapāramitābhāvanāmayasya yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāmayasya puṇyaskandhasya vipākaṃ sattveṣvevābhinandati nātmanaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:2683: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ kalyāṇāśayaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:2686: vibhutvasaṃniśritā pāramitābhāvanā trayākārā kāyavibhutvataḥ, caryāvibhutvataḥ deśanāvibhutvaśca /
SA01abhsubhu:2687: tatra kāyavibhutvaṃ tāthāgatau dvau kāyau draṣṭavyau svābhāvikaḥ sāṃbhogikaśca /
SA01abhsubhu:2688: tatra caryāvibhutvaṃ nairmāṇikaḥ kāyo draṣṭavyo yena sarvākārāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ sahadhārmikacaryāṃ darśayati /
SA01abhsubhu:2708: pratyekaṃ dānādīnāṃ traivighyāt tribhistribhirupastambhairyathākramaṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2709: tatra trividhaṃ dānam - abhayadānaṃ dharmadānamāmiṣadānaṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:2710: trividhaṃ śīlam - saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlaṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:2712: trividhaṃ vīryam - saṃnāhavīryaṃ prayogavīryaṃ sattvārthakriyāvīryaṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:2713: trividhaṃ dhyānam - dṛṣṭadharmasukhāvihārāya dhyānamabhijñānirhārāya dhyānaṃ sattvārthakriyāyai ca dhyānam /
SA01abhsubhu:2714: trividhā prajñā - saṃvṛtyālaṃbanā paramārthālaṃbanā sattvārthālambanā ca //
SA01abhsubhu:2716: abhayadānaṃ cittopastambhaḥ daurmanasyaviśeṣā[pa]gamāya cetasa āśvāsāya saṃhārāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2720: kuśalamūlākṣayatā sarvasattveṣu kriyārthādhikāritayā yāvatsāraṃ nirupadhiśeṣe 'pi nirvāṇadhātāvaparityāgaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:2722: gaṇaparikarṣaṇaṃ karmaṃ adhigamaṃ niśritya vineyānāmasamāhitasya cittasya samādhānāya samāhitasya vā cittasya vimokṣāyāvavādānuśāsanopradānam,
SA01abhsubhu:2727: punaḥ prabhedaḥ sapta dānāmi - mūladānaṃ gotrāvasthasya bodhisattvasya dānapāramitā,
SA01abhsubhu:2733: vinā vāhyenopakaraṇaparigraheṇa gaganagañjādisamādhibhirākāśe pāṇiṃ saṃcārya yatheṣṭaṃ ratnādivarṣaṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2744: tadanena viśiṣṭena cittotpādena pāramitānāṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ, tāsāṃ kāraṇabhāvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2746: yatpunaḥ parānupakaraṇopasaṃhāreṇānugṛhṇātyayaṃ svārthaḥ evamavaśiṣṭābhiḥ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2752: ityevaṃ tathatāsamyajjñānasvabhāvataḥ paramārtho dānādibhiḥ saṃgṛhīto veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2754: vipakṣo dānādīnāṃ yathākramaṃ mātsaryadauḥśīlye krodhakauśīdye vikṣepadauḥprajñe /
SA01abhsubhu:2755: api khalu yāvantaḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ pāramitābhiḥ saṃgṛhītāsteṣāṃ yo vipakṣo jñeyāvaraṇaṃ ca sa tāsāṃ vipakṣo veditavyaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:2761: mahābhogatā sugatigamanamavarābhedasukhasaumanasya bahulatā sattvādhipapatyamavyābādhyātmabhāvatā maheśākhyatā ca yathākramaṃ dānādīnāṃ vipākaphalaṃ veditavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:2767: tatraiva yā maitracittasya paratravighātotpīḍāviheṭhasaṃvaraṇatā sā śīlapāramitā /
SA01abhsubhu:2769: tatraiva yā bhūyo bhūyaścittasyotsahanatā sā vīryapāramitā /
SA01abhsubhu:2770: tatraiva yā cittasyaikāgratā kuśalādbahiravisaraṇatā sā dhyānapāramitā /
SA01abhsubhu:2771: tatraiva yā yathāvaddhetu phalasugṛhītatā dṛṣṭyaparāmarṣaṇatā sā prajñāpāramitā /
SA01abhsubhu:2772: evaṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyamubhayadānaṃ sarvajñajñānamiti kṛtvā //
SA01abhsubhu:2774: tatra dānādīnāṃ svabhāvo yathākramaṃ visargaḥ saṃvaro marṣaṇābhyutsāhaścitasthitiḥ pravicayaśca /
SA01abhsubhu:2776: tatra dānādīnāmupayogaḥ samādāpanā varṇavāditā sumanojñatā ca /
SA01abhsubhu:2777: tatra dānādīnāṃ ropaṇā yā parasaṃtāne pratiṣṭhāpanā /
SA01abhsubhu:2785: syāddānapāramitā na śīlapāramitā śīlapāramitayāsaṃgṛhītā yā dānapāramitā /
SA01abhsubhu:2787: yaddānaṃ sarvā sā pāramitā, yā dānapāramitā sarvaṃ taddānamiti catuṣkoṭikam /
SA01abhsubhu:2789: syāt pāramitā na dānaṃ śīlādayo mahābodhipariṇāmitāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2790: syāddānaṃ ca pāramitā ca [Abhidh-s-bh_112] bodhipariṇāmitāni dānādīni /
SA01abhsubhu:2791: syānna dānaṃ na pāramitā uktavinirmuktā dharmāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2793: yo dānaṃ samācarati sarvo 'sau dānapāramitānvayaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavatīti catuṣkoṭikam /
SA01abhsubhu:2799: viśeṣato vaipulye audāryagāmbhīryadeśanā tatphalasya sarvajñatvasya paramodāragambhīratvātphalānurūpyeṇa hetunirdeśo draṣṭavyaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:2800: ekatyānāṃ tadanadhimokṣe trāsaḥ bodhisattvagotravaikalyaṃ prakṛtyā hīnacittatayā gāmbhīryaudāryadeśanāṃ nādhimoktuṃ śaknuvanti /
SA01abhsubhu:2803: adhimucyamānānāmapyekatyānāmaniryāṇaṃ nītārtha sūtrama[na]nviṣya svayaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarṣasthāyitayā yathārutamarthābhiniveśāta /
SA01abhsubhu:2805: evamanye 'pi yathārutārthābhiniveśino mahāyāne na niryāntotiveditavyaṃ nānābhiprāyabhāṣitatvāt mahāyānasyeti /
SA01abhsubhu:2806: idaṃ ca saṃdhāyoktaṃ bhagavatā mahādharmādarśe dharmaparyāye - bodhisattvasya yathārutamayoniśo dharmān vicinvato 'ṣṭāviṃśatirasaddṛṣṭaya utpadyante //
SA01abhsubhu:2809_0: tatra nisvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā anutpannā ityevamādikaṃ mahāyāne rutamupalabhya tadabhisaṃdhyakuśalāḥ
SA01abhsubhu:2809_1: yathārutamevāsyārthamadhimucyamānā abhāva evāyaṃ bhagavatā deśitaḥ sarvadharmāṇāmanutpāda
SA01abhsubhu:2810: ta evamabhāvādinimittamabhiniviśamānāstrīnsvabhāvānavadante parikalpitaṃ svabhāvaṃ paratantraṃ pariniṣpannaṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:2811: tatrāyaṃ parikalpitaḥ svabhāvo yadrūpamiti vā yāvannirvāṇāmiti vābhilāpaprajñaptimātrabhabhūto niḥśarīrārtho yadbālā rūpādilakṣaṇaṃ samāropattaḥ parikalpayanti /
SA01abhsubhu:2813: tatrāyaṃ pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāvo yatsarvadharmāṇāṃ tattvaṃ [Abhidh-s-bh_113] tathatā /
SA01abhsubhu:2815: ta evaṃ sarvathā sarvadharmānapavadamānāstasyā apavādadṛṣṭeḥ pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ kāṃcideva yuktiṃ parigṛhṇanti,
SA01abhsubhu:2816: ye 'pi nītārthāḥ sūtrāntā nirabhilāpadharmatādyotakāstānapi sarvān svadṛṣṭayānulomyena pariṇāmayanti /
SA01abhsubhu:2817: te eva dve dṛṣṭo bhavataḥ parigrahadṛṣṭiḥ pariṇatidṛṣṭiśca /
SA01abhsubhu:2818: te punarevaṃdṛṣṭayo bhavanti - ya etāmīdṛśīṃ dṛṣṭiṃ niśritya kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā samācarati sa niravadya eva bhavati nirdoṣaḥ sarvamevāsya tatkalyāṇatāṃ yāti,
SA01abhsubhu:2820: te caivaṃ svadṛṣṭāvabhiniviṣṭāstad dṛṣṭiviparyayeṇa skandhādidharmavyavasthāpakaṃ śrāvakapiṭakamavajānanti,
SA01abhsubhu:2822: te ete dve dṛṣṭī bhavato 'vajñādṛṣṭiḥ prakopadṛṣṭiśca /
SA01abhsubhu:2823: svadṛṣṭyanusāreṇa caite yathāvacchūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni vyavasthāpayamānā atallakṣaṇe tallakṣaṇasaṃjñino viparītameṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpayanti,
SA01abhsubhu:2824: evaṃcittāśca bhavanti - yasyāmīdṛśyāṃ dharmatāyāmavatarantyavatārayanti vā sarve te 'prameyaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavantītyevamete dṛṣṭī viparītadṛṣṭiḥ prasavadṛṣṭiśca /
SA01abhsubhu:2825: yadā punaste tāṃ dṛṣṭimārabhya paraṃranuyujyante tadā na kiṃcitsvayamicchantyabhyupagantum,
SA01abhsubhu:2828: te caivamabhimānino bhavanti - ya evaṃ pratipadyante [te] samyagbuddhān bhagavataḥ pūjayanti satkurvantītyeṣāṃ satkāradṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2829: aviparītadharmatākuśalaiśca tatā dṛṣṭervivecyamānāḥ sūpapannayā prasiddhayā yuktayā pratyāyamānā api tāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ na kathaṃcit parityajanti,
SA01abhsubhu:2831: etāsāṃ ca yathānirdiṣṭānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ yadvāsanādauṣṭhulyaṃ sā mūladṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2832: eta eva ca saptadaśadṛṣṭayo doṣodbhāvanāmukhenāvaśiṣṭābhiḥ dṛṣṭibhiḥ punarnidiśyante /
SA01abhsubhu:2850: ata evānantaraṃ tatraiva sūtra uktamitīmāḥ saptadaśa samānāḥ daśa bhavanti,
SA01abhsubhu:2854: niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ yasmātsvayameṣāṃ bhāvo nāsti, pratyayāṃstvapekṣya bhāvo na pratiṣidhyate /
SA01abhsubhu:2855: yena vā svabhāvenaite pūrvamabhūvanna tena svena bhāvena bhūyaḥ śakyamebhirbhavitumiti niḥsvabhāvāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2857: yādṛśo vādṛṣṭasatyairdharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo lakṣaṇamabhilāpaprapañcavāsanāmukhena gṛhyate tena bālagrāhānurūpeṇa svabhāvena vi[ra]hitatvānniḥ svabhāvāḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:2858: api khalu sarvadharmā ucyante trayaḥ svabhāvāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2859: tatra parikalpitasya svalakṣaṇameva nāstyataḥ svalakṣaṇaniḥsvabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2860: paratantrasya svayamutpattirnāsti pratyayāpekṣaṇādato nāsya svena bhāvena bhāva ityutpattiniḥ svabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2861: pariniṣpanno viśuddhyālaṃbanatvāt paratantraparikalpitalakṣaṇābhāvasvabhāvatvācca paramārthaścaiṣa niḥsvabhāvatāprabhāvitaśceti paramārthaniḥsvabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2862: ityevaṃ ca kṛtvā niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā draṣṭavyāḥ, na tu sarvathālakṣaṇābhāvamadhikṛtyeti //
SA01abhsubhu:2863: api khalu mahāyāne tathāgatasya sarve 'bhiprāyāḥ saṃkṣepeṇa catvāro bhavanti /
SA01abhsubhu:2864: tadyathā samatābhiprāyo yadāha - ahameva tasmin samaye vipaśyī [Abhidh-s-bh_115] samyaksaṃbuddho 'bhūvamiti,
SA01abhsubhu:2866: kālāntarābhiprāyoyadāha - ye sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau praṇidhānaṃ kariṣyanti te tatropa patsyanta iti,
SA01abhsubhu:2867: vimalacandraprabhavasya ca nāmadheyagrahaṇamātreṇa niyato bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti,
SA01abhsubhu:2869: arthāntarābhiprāyo yadāha - niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā anutpannā ityevamādi, ayathārutārthatvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2870: pudgalāśayābhiprāyo yattadeva kuśalamūlaṃ kasyacitpraśaṃsanti kasyacidvigarha te 'lpamātrasaṃtuṣṭasya /
SA01abhsubhu:2873: kaukṛtyenāvṛtasya ye buddhabodhisattveṣvapakāramapi kariṣyanti te sarve svargopagā bhaviṣyantītyāha /
SA01abhsubhu:2875: ekaṃ ca yānaṃ na dvitīyamastīti deśayati śrāvakatvāśayatyājanārtham //
SA01abhsubhu:2885: kleśena ca susaṃkliṣṭā labhante bodhimuttamām // iti /
SA01abhsubhu:2887_0: vikṣepo hi visāraścetasaḥ viparyāse ca susthitāḥ iti nityasukhaśucyātmaviparyayeṇānityādike
SA01abhsubhu:2887_1: viparyāse ca susthitā aparihāṇitaḥ kleśena ca susaṃkliṣṭāḥ iti dīrghaduṣkara vyāyāmaśrameṇātyartha parikliṣṭāḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:2888: vaipulye dharmasamādhikuśalabodhisattvanirdeśaḥ śamathānuśaṃsaṃ vipaśyanānuśaṃsaṃ tadubhayānuśaṃsaṃ cādhikṛtya veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2890: kṣaṇe kṣaṇe prakarṣagāminyā prasrabdhyā nirantaramāśrayaspharaṇāt pratikṣaṇaṃ sarvadauṣṭhulyāśraya drāvaṇam,
SA01abhsubhu:2895_1: daśamyāṃ bhūmau pariniṣpattaye vā tāthāgatyāṃ bhūmāvuttarāduttaratara niṣyandavāsanādhānayogena
SA01abhsubhu:2896: tadetatpañcavidhāyā bhāvanāyāḥ phalaṃ pañcavidhaṃ nirvartata iti saṃdarśitam /
SA01abhsubhu:2899: kena kāraṇena tulye dharmakāyaniṣyandatve vaipulyadharmo dhūpamālyādibhiḥ pūjyo na tathā śrāvakayānadharmaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:2906: rūpādīnāṃ bahūnāṃ bahudhābhinnalakṣaṇasaṃjñānāmekayā sāmudāyikyā sattvaprajñaptyākṛcchreṇa ehi yāhi ityevamādisaṃvyavaharaṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:2908: na hi loke dharmamātrasaṃjñābhiḥ sarvaḥ saṃvyavahāro nirūḍhaḥ kiṃtarhi prāyeṇa sattvasaṃjñayā /
SA01abhsubhu:2911: pratītyasamutpādadharmatāyāma kovidāḥ sahasāditaḥ sarvathā sattvābhāvaṃ śrutvottrasyeyuriti /
