SA01abhsubhu:3588: prakārabhedalakṣaṇam - tattvalakṣaṇasya pañcadhā bhedo rūpaṃ yāvadvijñānamiti /
SA01abhsubhu:3589: parijñālakṣaṇasya tridhā bheda āsvādaṃ cāsvādayato yāvanniḥsaraṇaṃ ca niḥsarato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA01abhsubhu:3591: tatra sadevakāllokādyāvatsadevamānuṣāyāḥ prajāyā vimuktiḥ kleśebhyo vimokṣādata eva tadviśeṣaṇārthamāha niḥsṛta iti /
SA01abhsubhu:3594: evamanāgataduḥkhābhinirvartaka kleśavisaṃyoge sati duḥkhādapi vipramukto bhavatīti viśeṣaṇārthamāha - visaṃyukto vipramukta iti /
SA01abhsubhu:3596: tatra viparyāsāpagatena cetaseti darśanamārgaṃ darśayati, bahulaṃ vyahārṣamityanena bhāvanāmārgam /
SA01abhsubhu:3602: balābalamukhaṃ yatraikena padenānucyamānenāyamartho na gamitaḥ syāditi pratyekaṃ sarveṣāṃ padānāṃ sāmarthya pradarśyate /
SA01abhsubhu:3605: eṣāṃ ca padānāṃ pratyekaṃ sāmarthya pūrvavadveditavya yathā pratītyasamutpādasya lakṣaṇanirdeśe //
SA01abhsubhu:3607: pratyāhāramukhaṃ yatra sūtrasyaikaṃ padaṃ gṛhītvā vistareṇārthaḥ pratinirdiśyate /
SA01abhsubhu:3608: tadyathā ṣaḍbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bhikṣurhimavantamapi parvatarājaṃ mukhavāyunā cālayet,
SA01abhsubhu:3611: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuścittasyotpādakuśalo bhavati iha bhikṣurviviktaṃ kāmairyāvaccaturthadhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati /
SA01abhsubhu:3614: iha bhikṣurāsevanānvayādyaddhānabhāgīyaṃ dhyānaṃ tat sthitibhāgīyaṃ karoti /
SA01abhsubhu:3620: iha bhikṣuranutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmiti vistareṇa dve samyakprahāṇe /
SA01abhsubhu:3623: iha hi bhikṣurutpannānāṃ pāpakā nāmakuśalānāmiti vistareṇa dve samyakprahāṇe /
SA01abhsubhu:3626: iha hi bhikṣuśchandasamādhipradhānasaṃskārasamanvāgatamṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayatīti vistareṇa catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3629: teṣvapi catuṣkādiṣvekaikaṃ padamaparaiścatuṣkādibhiraparyanto hi nirhāro veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3630: tadyathā buddhākṣepasūtre - catvāra ime bodhisattvānāṃ bodhipariśodhakā dharmāḥ - śūnyatābhāvanā,
SA01abhsubhu:3634: catuṣkaḥ svārtha paramārtha cārabhya bodhipariśodhanāya caturvipakṣapratipakṣeṇa veditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3635: catvāro vipakṣāḥ - samāpattyāsvādanā, vyāpādaḥ, mānaḥ, tṛṣṇā ca lābhasatkāre //
SA01abhsubhu:3640: aparaḥ paryāyaḥ - prathamena jñānasaṃbhārastribhiḥ puṇyasaṃbhāraḥ paridīpitaḥ,
SA01abhsubhu:3645: caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvāḥ śūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti - adhyātmaṃ cittāvikaṃpanatayādhimuktipravicayabalādhānatayā,
SA01abhsubhu:3648: yadāśritya yathā ca bhāvayanti tadetena paridīpitam /
SA01abhsubhu:3653: caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvāḥ sarvasattveṣvapratihatacittā bhavanti maitrībhāvanayā,
SA01abhsubhu:3657: atrāpi yadāśritya yathā cāpratihatacittā bhavanti tatparidīpitaṃ bhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:3664: caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā bodhisattvānāṃ nityaṃ hitamupasaṃharanti - ātmanaḥ paritulanatayā,
SA01abhsubhu:3673: caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā nirāmiṣeṇa cittena dharmadānaṃ saṃprakāśayanti - antarāyasukhaprativedhatayā,
SA01abhsubhu:3687: prabhidyasaṃdarśana[vi]niścayo yathānirdiṣṭeṣu skandhādiṣu dharmeṣu yathāyogamekāvacārakādīni / tatra -
SA01abhsubhu:3688: ekāvacārako nāma praśno yenaikaṃ dharmaṃ pariśiṣṭaiḥ saha pratyekaṃ praśnayitvā tamapahāya dvitīyaṃ tenānyaiśca saha praśnayatyevamekaikasyaiva sarvān praśnayati /
SA01abhsubhu:3690: yo vā rūpāyatanena cakṣurāyatanenāpi sa iti pūrvapādakaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3691: yaścakṣurāyatanena samanvāgataḥ śrotrāyatanenāpi sa ityatra catuṣkoṭikam /
SA01abhsubhu:3692: evaṃ yāvanmanaāyatanenāpi sa ityatra yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:3695: yo vā cakṣurāyatanena rūpāyatanenāpi sa iti paścātpādakaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3696: yo rūpāyatanena samanvāgataḥ śrotrāyatanenāpi sa ityatra cāpi paścātpādakaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3698: yaḥ śrotrāyatanena samanvāgataścakṣurāyatanenāpi sa ityatra catuṣkoṭikam /
SA01abhsubhu:3701: pūrvapādakaṃ dvayordharmayoḥ kathaṃcideva dharmamārabhya parasparaṃ pṛṣṭayoḥ pūrvadharmamadhiṣṭhāya yadvayākriyate /
SA01abhsubhu:3702: tadyathā yajjñānaṃ jñeyamapi tadyadvā jñeyaṃ jñānamapi taditi /
SA01abhsubhu:3704: syājjñeyaṃ na jñānam, tadanye dharmā iti //
SA01abhsubhu:3705: paścātpādakaṃ tathaiva dvayordharmayoḥ parasparaṃ pṛṣṭayoryatpaścimamadhiṣṭhāya vyākriyate /
SA01abhsubhu:3706: tadyathā yadgrāhyaṃ grāhakamapi tadyadvā grāhakaṃ grāhyamapi taditi /
SA01abhsubhu:3708: syādgrāhyaṃ na grāhakam, rūpādayaḥ pañca viṣayā dharmāyatanaṃ ca saṃprayuktakavarjyam //
SA01abhsubhu:3709: dvikoṭikaṃ yatra dve koṭī vyākriyete tadanyāsaṃbhavāt tadyathā skandhasya vyavasthānaṃ dhātuvyavasthānaṃ ca nigamayyocyate - yā skandhasaṃkhyā dhātusaṃkhyāpi sā,
SA01abhsubhu:3711: dvikoṭikam - syāt skandhasaṃkhyā na dhātusaṃkhyā, rūpaskandho vijñānaskandhaścaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3712: tathāhi naiko dhāturasti yaḥ sakalarūpaskandhalakṣaṇo vā syāt sakalavijñānaskandhalakṣaṇo vā /
SA01abhsubhu:3715: trikoṭikaṃ yatra tisra eva koṭayo vyākriyante /
SA01abhsubhu:3716: tadyathā yā skandhasaṃkhyāyatanasaṃkhyāpi sā, yā vāyatanasaṃkhyā skandhasaṃkhyāpi seti /
SA01abhsubhu:3719: syāt skandhasaṃkhyāyatanasaṃkhyā ca vijñānaskandho manaāyatanaṃ ca /
SA01abhsubhu:3723: yo vā śrotrendriyeṇa samanvāgataścakṣurindriyeṇāpi sa iti /
SA01abhsubhu:3728: oṃkāritaṃ yatra praśne vyākaraṇamomiti kriyate evametadityabhyupagamyata ityarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3730: ye vā saṃskārāḥ sarve te 'nityā iti pṛṣṭena omiti vyākartavyam //
SA01abhsubhu:3732: tadyathā skandhavinirmuktāḥ saṃskārāḥ katibhiḥ satyaiḥ saṃgṛhītā iti /
SA01abhsubhu:3733: prātikṣepikam - na santi skandhavinirmuktāḥ saṃskārā iti //
SA01abhsubhu:3760: ete cānupalambhā yat kiṃcidatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ yāvadyadvā dūre yadvāntika ityetadanukramānusāreṇa draṣṭavyāḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:3763: yo nopalabhate yadyena yasmai yato yasya yatra nopalabhate yāvadvividhaścānupalambha iti //
SA01abhsubhu:3789: rājakulaṃ yatra rājā svayaṃ saṃnihitaḥ yuktakulaṃ yatra rājñādhiyuktāḥ sabhā vaṇik sabhādi /
SA01abhsubhu:3790: prāmāṇikāḥ sahāyakāḥ yeṣāṃ vacanaṃ vādiprativādinau na saṃśayataḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3791: dharmārthakuśalāśca śramaṇabrāhmaṇā ye teṣu śāstreṣu granthataścārthataśca vyutpannabuddhayaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:3792: vādādhiṣṭhānaṃ yadadhiṣṭhāya vādaḥ kriyate tadyathā sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca //
SA01abhsubhu:3793: tatra svabhāvaḥ sādhya ātmasvabhāvo dharmasvabhāvaśca nāstīti vāstīti vā //
SA01abhsubhu:3794: viśeṣaḥ sādhya ātmaviśeṣo dharmaviśeṣaśca sarvagato na sarvagato nityānityo rūpyarūpītyevamādibhiḥ prakāraiḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:3796: sādhyagrahaṇaṃ yadi na kriyeta siddhasyāpi svapakṣasya pareṣāṃ deśanā pratijñā prasajyeta /
SA01abhsubhu:3797: svarucitārthagrahaṇaṃ na kriyeta parapakṣasyāpi sādhyasya vacanaṃ pratijñā prasajyeta /
SA01abhsubhu:3798: paragrahaṇaṃ na kriyeta ekākino 'pi tadvacanaṃ pratijñā prasajyeta /
SA01abhsubhu:3799: saṃprāpaṇagrahaṇaṃ na kriyeta kāyenāpi tadarthābhinayanaṃ pratijñā prasajyeta /
SA01abhsubhu:3800: vijñāpanāgrahaṇaṃ na kriyetāvijñāte 'pi tadarthe śrotṛbhiḥ pratijñā prasajyeta /
SA01abhsubhu:3801: yathokte tu vyavasthāne sarva ete doṣā na bhavanti, tasmādevamasyā vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam /
SA01abhsubhu:3804: tathāhi pratyakṣānupalaṃbhādupalaṃbhādvetyanena samākhyānena tasmin sādhye 'pratītasyārthasya saṃpratyaya utpadyate /
SA01abhsubhu:3806: pratyakṣopalaṃbhānupalaṃbhau punaḥ svabhāvaṃ liṅgaṃ cādhikṛtya veditavyau //
SA01abhsubhu:3810: yathā sādhyo 'rthastribhiravayavaiḥ sādhitastathā śiṣṭānāmapi tajjātīyānāṃ sādhyānāṃ sādhitārthadharmopagamāya nayatvena samākhyānaṃ yuktyātideśa upanayaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:3817: sa hyātmā prajñapyamānaḥ skandhalakṣaṇo vā prajñapyeta,
SA01abhsubhu:3820: tadyadi skandhalakṣaṇastenāsvatantrāḥ skandhāḥ pratītyasamutpannā udagavyayadharmāṇastallakṣaṇa ātmānopapadyata iti doṣaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3821: atha skandheṣu tenānityaskandhāśrita ātmānityaḥ prāpnotīti doṣaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3822: athānyatra skandhebhyastena nirdehaka ātmā niṣprayojana iti doṣaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3823: athāskandhakastena prakṛtyaiva muktasya kevalino mokṣārthaprayatnavaiyarthyamiti doṣaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:3825: taddhayatītaṃ vidyamānalakṣaṇatvena prajñapyamānaṃ vartamānalakṣaṇaṃ vā prajñapyeta,
SA01abhsubhu:3826: vartamāne vā anyatra vā vartamānāt vartamānanirapekṣaṃ vā /
SA01abhsubhu:3828: atha vartamāne tenāniruddhe niruddhātmakasya saṃbandho na yujyata iti doṣaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3829: athānyatra vartamānāttena vartamānaṃ hitvā na kiṃcittadvastūpalabhyate yatra tatprajñapyata iti doṣaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3832: ato 'nena vartamānaprajñaptau caturdoṣeṇa siddhenāsiddha ātmā nāstīti skandhaprajñaptau caturvidhadoṣopalaṃbhāt prasādhyate nāstīti //
SA01abhsubhu:3833: evamātmaviparyāsaṃ pratiṣidhyaitayaiva yuktyā nityādayo 'pi na santītyatideśa upanayaḥ //
SA01abhsubhu:3834: yasmādetadevaṃ tasmādanityāḥ pañca skandhāḥ yāvadanātmāna iti nigamanamiti //
SA01abhsubhu:3837: sadgrahaṇaṃ ghaṭādidravyāṇāṃ loke pratyakṣasaṃmatānāṃ pratyakṣatvavyudāsārtha prajñaptimātratvāt /
SA01abhsubhu:3842_0: pratyakṣādyadanyacchiṣṭamapratyakṣaṃ niyamena tatsahavarti prasiddhaṃ draṣṭuḥ pūrvaṃ
SA01abhsubhu:3842_1: tasya tatpratyakṣamīkṣamāṇasya tadanyasmin śiṣṭasaṃpratyaya utpadyate tenāpyatra
SA01abhsubhu:3845: yatropadeśe tatpratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca sarvathā na virudhyete na vyabhicarataḥ sa āptāgamaḥ saṃpratyayitvāt //
SA01abhsubhu:3846: vādālaṃkāro yena yukto vādī vādaṃ kurvāṇo 'tyarthaṃ śobhate /
SA01abhsubhu:3848: tatra svaparasamayajñatā svasiddhāntaṃ parasiddhāntaṃ cārabhya granthataścārthataśca paurvāparyeṇa nirantaraṃ vyutpattiparipākaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3855: tatra kathātyāgo 'sādhu mama sādhu tavetyevamādibhiḥ prakāraiḥ svaparavādadoṣaguṇābhyupagamaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3857: yathoktaṃ sūtre - āyuṣmāṃścundikastīrthikaiḥ saha vādaṃ kurvannavajānitvā pratijānāti pratijānitvāvajānātīti /
SA01abhsubhu:3871: [Abhidh-s-bh_154] asthiraṃ yatpratijñāyāvajñātamavajñāya pratijñātamatitvaramāṇayā vācā hi tūrṇaparāmṛṣṭaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3877: akaraṇena vā guṇadoṣau vicārya vādasya nigrahasthānānāsādanāt,
SA01abhsubhu:3883: tadyathā svaparasamayajñatā vāde bahukaro dharmo yena sarvatra kathāvastuni vādaṃ karoti / śeṣaṃ sugamam //
SA01abhsubhu:3884: kuśalapakṣaprayuktenetyuktvā pratipattisārakeṇeti vacanamāśayaviśuddhijñāpanārthaṃ na lābhasatkārādinimittaṃ śrutādikuśalapakṣe prayuktenetyarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3886: evaṃ ca svahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyata ityayameṣāṃ padānāmanusaṃdhirveditavyaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3887: avigṛhyāpi tāvadvāde kriyamāṇe prakṛtigambhīratvānmahāyānadharmasya durlabhājñā prāgeva vigṛhya /
SA01abhsubhu:3888: yaiśca saha vigṛhya vādaḥ kriyate te 'pi pratipattāro nājñābhiprāyāḥ pratibruvanti kiṃtarhyupālambhābhiprāyāḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3889: yeṣvapi prāśnikeṣu sa vādaḥ kriyate te vāsabhyā avyutpannā vā bhavantyabhiniviṣṭā vā /
SA01abhsubhu:3890: sarvo 'pi ca vādā prāyeṇa ṣaḍbhirdoṣairyukto bhavati /
SA01abhsubhu:3891: tathāhi vādaṃ kurvāṇaḥ kadācidatirabhasenāsatpakṣamapi parigṛhyābhiniveśena chalajātinigrahasthānānyapi prayukte /
SA01abhsubhu:3894: paruṣamapi bruvate, yena prativādyādayaḥ cittaṃ pradūṣayanti /
SA01abhsubhu:3895: svayaṃ ca teṣu cittaṃ pradūṣayatītyebhiḥ ṣaḍbhirdoṣairyukto bhavati //
SA01abhsubhu:3898: sati cānupaśame durlabhaṃ paracittānurakṣaṇaṃ svacittānurakṣaṇaṃ ca yena pare prasādaṃ labheran vimuktyāyatanayogena svacittaṃ samādhīyate /
SA01abhsubhu:3899: prāyeṇa vāde kathamahaṃ jayeyaṃ pare parājīyerannityevaṃ cittaṃ samudācarati /
SA01abhsubhu:3903: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hatvā ityasyāṃ gāthāyāṃ loke yadatyarthamavadyaṃ pātakaṃ tadabhidhāyīnyakṣarāṇyetāni viśuddhau pariṇāmitāni /
SA01abhsubhu:3908: tatra pratiniyato gurujano mātā pitā ca,
SA01abhsubhu:3920: ṣaḍāyatanaṃ ca sagocaramadhikṛtya mātrādayo draṣṭavyāḥ, tatsādharmyāt /
SA01abhsubhu:3929: hīno loke caturvidhaḥ - manaskarmahīnaḥ kāyakarmahīno vākkarmahīna upabhogahīnaśca /
SA01abhsubhu:3935: upabhogahī naḥ śvā kā kaḥ preto vetyevamādikaḥ, charditabhakṣaṇāditi //
SA01abhsubhu:3943: vāntāśo dṛṣṭe dharme upakaraṇabalena kāyaṃ saṃdhā rayato 'pi bhogajīvitāśābhāvāditi //
SA01abhsubhu:3946: śarīraṃ punarasyāḥ samādhiṃ niśritya bodhisattvā darśanabhāvanāmārgābhyāṃ mahābodhiṃ spṛśantīti //
SA01abhsubhu:3948: dānena ca parikhidyate, dīrghakālaṃ dānanimittaṃ paramaduṣkaraśramābhyupagamāt /
SA01abhsubhu:3949: yācanakaṃ ca dveṣṭi, svayaṃ grāhābhirucitatayā yācanakaprātikūlyāt /
SA01abhsubhu:3950: na kiṃcit kadāciddadāti, sarvasya vastunaḥ sarvadā dānāt /
SA01abhsubhu:3952: tatra parameṇa brahmacaryeṇa samanvāgata iti lokottareṇa mārgeṇetyarthaḥ /
SA01abhsubhu:3953: nānyatra maithunānmaithunasya niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣata iti tasyaiva yathābhūta parijñānena tatprahāṇāt /
SA01abhsubhu:3957: maithunapratipakṣeṇa ca dharmeṇottrasyati tatpratipakṣeṇa mārgeṇa sarvasattvottaraṇāya vyavasyatīti kṛtvā /
SA01abhsubhu:3958_0: abhīkṣṇaṃ ca dvayadvayaṃ samāpadyate saṃkleśavyavada nadvayena phalahetubhedena catuḥsatyātmakena
SA01abhsubhu:3964: ityabhidharmasamuccaye bhāṣyataḥ sāṃkathyaviniścayo nāma pañcamaḥ samuccayaḥ samāptaḥ //
